name: AHJID
description: Municipal authority, for example, town, city or country, that has jurisdiction to define local code requirements.

name: ALTASurveyLink
description: Link to the American Land Title Association (ALTA) survey.

name: ALTASurveyStatus
description: Status of the American Land Title Association Survey (ALTA).

name: ALTASurveyor
description: Name of the surveyor providing the American Land Title Association (ALTA) survey.

name: ASTME28484ModelCoeffA1
description: Coefficient a1 in Equation 1 of ASTM E2848-11, P = E(a1 + a2 x E + a3 x Ta + a4 x V) where P is power, E is in-plane irradiance, Ta is ambient air temperature and V is wind speed.

name: ASTME28484ModelCoeffA2
description: Coefficient a2 in Equation 1 of ASTM E2848-11, P = E(a1 + a2 x E + a3 x Ta + a4 x V) where P is power, E is in-plane irradiance, Ta is ambient air temperature and V is wind speed.

name: ASTME28484ModelCoeffA3
description: Coefficient a3 in Equation 1 of ASTM E2848-11, P = E(a1 + a2 x E + a3 x Ta + a4 x V) where P is power, E is in-plane irradiance, Ta is ambient air temperature and V is wind speed.

name: ASTME28484ModelCoeffA4
description: Coefficient a4 in Equation 1 of ASTM E2848-11, P = E(a1 + a2 x E + a3 x Ta + a4 x V) where P is power, E is in-plane irradiance, Ta is ambient air temperature and V is wind speed.

name: ASTME2848ModelResidualMean
description: Mean value of the residuals of the regression model at ASTM E2848-11 Eq. 1.

name: ASTME2848ModelResidualStandardDeviation
description: Standard deviation of the residuals of the regression model at ASTM E2848-11 Eq. 1.

name: ASTME2848PowerRtgAtRptCond
description: Power rating P0 at reporting condition calculated using fitted model. Calculated by Equation 2 of ASTM E2848-11, P0 = E(a1 + a2 x E + a3 x Ta + a4 x V) where E is in-plane irradiance, Ta is ambient air temperature and V is wind speed at the reporting condition.

name: ASTME2848PowerRtgUncertainty
description: Expanded uncertainty of the power rating at the reference condition. See ASTM E2848-11 paragraph 9.4 for guidance on calculating the expanded uncertainty.

name: AcctRecvCustomerName
description: Name of the customer with an outstanding balance.

name: AccuracyClass
description: Accuracy class of an instrument. The string should identify the standard where applicable, or a term in common use by calibration laboratories. For example, for a pyranometer, accuracy class can be "Secondary Standard". For an AC power meter, accuracy class could be "ANSI C12.20-2015 Class 0.5".

name: ActiveEnergyOrParasiticLoad
description: Actual amount of active energy consumed by the system, also called Parasitic Load.

name: ActiveEnergyPerfIndex
description: Active (real) Energy Performance Index measurement during times when the system is functioning (offline times removed) as in IEC 61724-3 Section 6.8, calculated as measured energy divided by expected energy.

name: ActualCostLowPerfFromLostEnergyCostPerkWdc
description: Actual estimated cost of future low performance during period of the capacity test in currency/kWdc.

name: ActualCostPenaltiesAndLowPerfCostPerkWdc
description: Actual cost of penalties and low performance during period of the test in currency/W.

name: ActualCostPenaltiesFromLostEnergyCostPerkWdc
description: Actual cost of penalties for low performance during period of the capacity test in currency/kWdc.

name: ActualCostPenaltiesFromUnAvailCostPerkWdc
description: Actual cost of penalties due to unavailability during period of the availability test in currency/kWh.

name: ActualCostUnavailFromLostEnergyCostPerkWh
description: Actual estimated cost for future lost revenue from lost energy generation during period of the availability test in currency/kWh.

name: ActualToExpectEnergyProdOfProj
description: Ratio of actual to expected energy production of projects.

name: AdvisorInvoicesAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Advisor Invoices is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: AdvisorInvoicesAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Advisor Invoices or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: AdvisorInvoicesAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Advisor Invoices is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: AdvisorInvoicesCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Advisor Invoices.

name: AdvisorInvoicesDocLink
description: Link to the Advisor Invoices document.

name: AdvisorInvoicesEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Advisor Invoices.

name: AdvisorInvoicesExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Advisor Invoices or issues raised.

name: AdvisorInvoicesExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Advisor Invoices.

name: AerosolModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to atmospheric aerosol particles, including water vapor or fog, smoke from wildfires or agricultural burning, and air pollution due to urban proximity of system, for a typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: AerosolModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to atmospheric aerosol particles, including water vapor or fog, smoke from wildfires or agricultural burning, and air pollution due to urban proximity of system, for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: Albedo
description: Percentage of light that is reflected off the ground surface

name: AllInEnergyPerfIndex
description: Actual energy performance index including times when the system is not functioning as in IEC 61724-3 Section 6.8, calculated by measured energy divided by expected energy.

name: AllInYield
description: Total (all-in) yield.

name: AllProjAcctBalances
description: Account balance for the project.

name: AllowanceAcctForCreditLossesOfFinAssets
description: The amount of an allowance account used to record impairments to financial assets due to credit losses.

name: AmbTempForPowerTargetCapMeas
description: Ambient temperature used for the target conditions for the capacity measurement using IEC 61724-2. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: AppraisalAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Appraisal is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: AppraisalAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Appraisal or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: AppraisalAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Appraisal is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: AppraisalCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Appraisal.

name: AppraisalCostApproach
description: Indicates if the appraisal considers the cost approach. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: AppraisalDocLink
description: Link to the Appraisal document.

name: AppraisalEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Appraisal.

name: AppraisalEnteredDate
description: Date on which appraisal was entered / corrected.

name: AppraisalExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Appraisal or issues raised.

name: AppraisalExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Appraisal.

name: AppraisalID
description: Identifier for an appraisal performed on a site.

name: AppraisalIncomeApproach
description: Indicates if the appraisal considers the income approach. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: AppraisalInputDevelopmentFee
description: Amount of the development fee as an input to the appraisal.

name: AppraisalInputEPCFee
description: Amount of the Engineering Procurement and Construction fee, as an input to the appraisal.

name: AppraisalInputInvestTaxCreditBasisForSystemPct
description: The Investment Tax Credit-eligible basis for the plant.

name: AppraisalInputInvestTaxCreditForStorage
description: The Investment Tax Credit-eligible amount for the storage component.

name: AppraisalInputInvestTaxCreditforSystem
description: The Investment Tax Credit-eligible amount for the plant.

name: AppraisalInputStorageUsefulLife
description: Useful life of storage system in years, as input to the appraisal.

name: AppraisalInputWtAvgCostofCapitalPct
description: Weighted average cost of capital under income approach as an input to the appraisal.

name: AppraisalMeth
description: Description of the methodology for the appraisal, for example, average, lower of, or higher of.

name: AppraisalMktComparison
description: Indicates if the appraisal considers market comparables. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: AppraisalSource
description: Description of the source of the appraisal, for example, sponsor, internal or appraiser.

name: AppraisalStage
description: Identifies the stage of the appraisal, for example, closing, initial funding, final funding.

name: AppraisalStatus
description: Identifies the status of the appraisal, for example, preliminary, indicative or final.

name: AppraisalVersion
description: Description of the version of the appraisal.

name: AppraisedValueFairMktValue
description: Total appraised value for the system at fair market value.

name: AppraisedValueStorageComponent
description: Appraised value for the storage component.

name: AppraisedValueSystemCostMeth
description: Appraised value for the total system based on the cost method.

name: AppraisedValueSystemIncomeMeth
description: Appraised value for the total system based on the income method.

name: AppraisedValueSystemMktCompMeth
description: Appraised value for the total system based on the market comparable method.

name: AppraisedValueValuationPoint
description: Point in time for which value is appraised, for example, at commercial operations date, at flip point, at PPA expiration.

name: AppraisedValuetoAppraisedValueAtCommercOpDatePct
description: Appraised value as % of appraised value at commercial operations date.

name: ApprovAvailabilityofProof
description: Indication that proof of approval is available. If proof of approval is available, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ApprovCondActionDesc
description: Description of actions taken in response to the approval condition.

name: ApprovCondDesc
description: Description of the approval condition and possible follow up.

name: ApprovCondStatus
description: Status of the approval condition or follow up request, for example open or closed.

name: ApprovDateofApprov
description: Date on which final approval was obtained.

name: ApprovGrantingEmployee
description: Identifier for the employee granting approval.

name: ApprovID
description: Identifier for the approval needed for a financing event.

name: ApprovMemoLink
description: Link to the approval memo.

name: ApprovMemoSubmsnDate
description: Date on which the approval memo was submitted.

name: ApprovNoticeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Approval Notice is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: ApprovNoticeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Approval Notice or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: ApprovNoticeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Approval Notice is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: ApprovNoticeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Approval Notice.

name: ApprovNoticeDocLink
description: Link to the Approval Notice document.

name: ApprovNoticeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Approval Notice.

name: ApprovNoticeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Approval Notice or issues raised.

name: ApprovNoticeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Approval Notice.

name: ApprovProofLink
description: Link to the proof of approval.

name: ApprovStatus
description: Status of the approval request, for example Not Submitted, Submitted, Conditional Approval, Final Approval, Declined.

name: ApprovTypeDesc
description: Description of the type of approval, for example Solar Project Finance, Line of Business, Credit, Special Purpose Entity.

name: ArrayNumOfSubArrays
description: Number of sub arrays which are PV surface unit connected to an inverter.

name: ArrayTotalModuleArea
description: Area covered by all modules in the array.

name: AssetMgmtContractAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Asset Management Contract is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: AssetMgmtContractAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Asset Management Contract. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: AssetMgmtContractAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Asset Management Contract is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: AssetMgmtContractCntrparty
description: Name of the asset manager.

name: AssetMgmtContractDocLink
description: Link to the Asset Management Contract document.

name: AssetMgmtContractExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractExpenseActual
description: Amount of actual asset management expenses.

name: AssetMgmtContractExpenseExpect
description: Amount of expected asset management expenses.

name: AssetMgmtContractInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractInvoicingDate
description: Invoicing date of the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractPmtDeadline
description: Payment terms for the Asset Management Contract agreement.

name: AssetMgmtContractPmtMeth
description: Payment method for the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractRate
description: Price rate in currency per kWdc per year for the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractRateAmt
description: Rate for the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractRateEscalator
description: Escalator percent per year in the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractSubcontractor
description: Name of the subcontractor in the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractSubcontractorScope
description: Description of scope of work to be performed by the subcontractor to the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtContractTerm
description: Term of the Asset Management Contract. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: AssetMgmtContractType
description: Description of the Asset Management Contract.

name: AssetMgmtCostPerWatt
description: The aggregate costs related to asset management during the reporting period. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: AssetMgrBillingMeth
description: Description of the asset manager billing method.

name: AssetMgrConsumablesStrategy
description: Description of the asset manager's strategy to manage consumable parts, which are items such as fuses that are used up quickly and must be replenished.

name: AssetMgrContinuityOfOperationProgram
description: Description of the asset manager continuity of operations program.

name: AssetMgrEnergyForecastingCapabilities
description: Description of the energy forecasting and settlement capabiities and tools of the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrFailureAndRemedProcedures
description: Description of the asset manager failure and remediation procedures.

name: AssetMgrFederalTaxIDNum
description: Federal tax identification number for the Asset Manager.

name: AssetMgrID
description: Identifier for the Asset Manager.

name: AssetMgrInsurPolicyMgmt
description: Description of the asset manager insurance policy management.

name: AssetMgrMegawattUnderMgmt
description: Number of Megawatt under management by the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrNERCAndFERCQual
description: Description of the qualifications required through the North American Electric Reliability Corporation (NERC) and Federal Regulatory Commission (FERC) for the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrNumOfProj
description: Number of projects under management by the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrNumOfStates
description: Number of states where Asset manager operates.

name: AssetMgrOpCenter
description: Description of the operational center managed by the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrOtherServ
description: Description of the  other service offerings available from the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrOutsourcingPlan
description: Description of operational areas that will be outsourced along with qualifications of the companies the asset manager will engage.

name: AssetMgrPerfGuarantees
description: Description of the asset manager performance guarantees.

name: AssetMgrPreventAndCorrectiveMaint
description: Description of the preventative and corrective maintenance plan and use of major maintenance budgets and reserve account by the asset manager.

name: AssetMgrProjOwnToThirdPartyProj
description: Ratio of projects owned by the asset manager versus projected owned by third parties.

name: AssetMgrRECAccounting
description: Description of the asset manager plans for renewable energy credit (REC) accounting, for example through WREGIS, renewable energy registry and tracking.

name: AssetMgrRpt
description: Description of the asset manager reporting plan, for example monthly operating reports, establishing a reporting portal.

name: AssetMgrSparePartsStrategy
description: Description of the asset manager's strategy to manage spare parts.

name: AssetMgrSupplyStrategy
description: Description of the asset manager supply strategy.

name: AssetMgrWarrExperience
description: Description of the asset manager warranty claims experience and warranty work management.

name: AssetMgrWorkflow
description: Description of the asset manager workflow process and ticketing system.

name: AssetsSolarFacil
description: Amount of assets classified as solar facilities.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Assignment and Assumption Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Assignment and Assumption Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Assignment and Assumption Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Assignment and Assumption Agreement.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Assignment and Assumption Agreement.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Assignment and Assumption Agreement or issues raised.

name: AssignAndAssumpAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Assignment and Assumption Agreement.

name: AssignAndAssumptionsDocLink
description: Link to the Assignment And Assumption Agreement document.

name: AssignOfInterestAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Assignment of Interest is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: AssignOfInterestAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Assignment of Interest or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: AssignOfInterestAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Assignment of Interest is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: AssignOfInterestCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Assignment of Interest.

name: AssignOfInterestDocLink
description: Link to the Assignment Of Interest document.

name: AssignOfInterestEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Assignment of Interest.

name: AssignOfInterestExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Assignment of Interest or issues raised.

name: AssignOfInterestExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Assignment of Interest.

name: AssumedIrradiationModelAmt
description: Assumed plane of array (POA) irradiation per annum based on major design/energy production model used.

name: AuditFees
description: Amount of audit fees incurred during the period.

name: AuditingFeePerWatt
description: Fee for auditing financial information. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: AuthToMarkLetterFromNRTL
description: Indicates if the signed Authorization to Mark Letter is from NRTL. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: Avail
description: Percent of AC capacity available during a period of time.

name: AvailCalcMeth
description: Description of method used to calculate availability, which could be IECRE 61724-3 or some other method.

name: AvgTimeBetweenEquipFailures
description: Average amount of time between failures of any piece of equipment or the system as a whole. The value should be entered as a durationItemType using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS, where H means hours, M means minutes, and S means seconds.

name: BMSNumOfSystems
description: Total number of battery management systems in the plant (system).

name: BMSRtg
description: Maximum power output, under standard test conditions, of the battery management system.

name: BackUpOMMonFee
description: Monthly fees for backup Operations and Maintenance Contract.

name: BackupAssetMgmtContractCntrparty
description: Name of  backup asset management company.

name: BackupAssetMgmtContractTerm
description: Term of the Backup Asset Management Contract. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: BackupAssetMgmtExpDate
description: Expiration date of the backup asset management agreement.

name: BackupAssetMgmtFeePriorToActivation
description: Amount paid prior to activation of the backup asset management program.

name: BackupAssetMgmtInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the backup asset management contract.

name: BackupAssetMgmtMobilizationFee
description: Mobilization fee for backup Operations and Maintenance contract.

name: BackupAssetMgmtMonFee
description: Monthly fees for duration of the backup asset management program.

name: BackupOMContractCntrparty
description: Name of backup Operations and Maintenance contract counterparty.

name: BackupOMContractInitiationDate
description: Initiation date for backup Operations and Maintenance contract.

name: BackupOMContractTerm
description: Term of Backup Operations and Maintenance contract. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: BackupOMUpfrontMobilizationFee
description: Mobilization fee for backup Operations and Maintenance contract per the Continuity of Operations Agreement which is the plan for the installation going forward including contingencies which may be triggered by financial performance.

name: BankAcctNum
description: Bank account number.

name: BankAcctTypeDesc
description: Description of the type of bank account, for example, operating, lockbox, reserve, accrual.

name: BankInvest
description: Size of the banks investment in the entity.

name: BankName
description: Bank at which account is held.

name: BankRoutingNum
description: Routing number for the bank account.

name: BatteryInverterACPowerRtg
description: Maximum power output, in AC, of the inverter model, IEC62933-1

name: BatteryInverterNum
description: Total number of battery inverters in the system.

name: BatteryNum
description: Total number of batteries in the system.

name: BatteryRtg
description: Maximum power output, under standard test conditions, of the battery, per IEC62933-1.

name: BatteryStyle
description: Battery chemistry style which can be LiOn, Pb, or NiCad.

name: BillOfSaleAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Bill of Sale for the installation is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: BillOfSaleAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Bill of Sale for the installation or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: BillOfSaleAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Bill of Sale for the installation is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: BillOfSaleExceptDesc

description: Indicates if the Board Resolution for Master Lessee, Lessee and Operator is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: BoardResolForMasterLesseeLesseeAndOpAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Board Resolution for Master Lessee, Lessee and Operator or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: BoardResolForMasterLesseeLesseeAndOpAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Board Resolution for Master Lessee, Lessee and Operator is available in final form. If it is available in final form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: BoardResolForMasterLesseeLesseeAndOpCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Board Resolution for Master Lessee, Lessee and Operator.

name: BoardResolForMasterLesseeLesseeAndOpEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Board Resolution for Master Lessee, Lessee and Operator.

description: Description of any exceptions to the Board Resolution for Master Lessee, Lessee and Operator or issues raised.

name: BoardResolForMasterLesseeLesseeAndOpExpDate

name: BreakageFeeAgreeAvailOfDoc

name: BreakageFeeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Breakage Fee Side Letter, used in the event the project is not funded or if the developer decides not to move forward with the project and breaks the agreement.

name: BuildingInspctAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Building Inspection is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Building Inspection or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: CECListingDate

name: CalibrationDateLast
description: Date of last calibration

name: CalibrationInterval

name: CapFactorRatio

The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: CostSegregationAmortClass
description: Description of the amortization class used, for example Modified Accelerated Cost Recovery System.

name: CostSegregationAmortMeth
description: Description of the amortization method, for example straight line, 200% declining.

name: CostSegregationAmortPctOfAppraisedValuePct
description: Tax basis in amortization class, as percent of appraised value

name: CostSegregationAmortTaxBasis
description: Tax basis in amortization class

name: CostsAndExpensesPerWatt

name: CreditPerfDateOfFICOScore
description: Date of the FICO score for an OffTaker.

name: CreditPerfRetailCreditCheckDate
description: Date the credit check was performed.

name: CreditPerfRetailDaysDelinquent
description: Number of days over 30 days past due (delinquent).

name: CreditPerfRetailDebtToIncomeRatio
description: Debt-to-income ratio, also known as Back End Ratio which is defined as the ratio of a borrower's total monthly debt expense (including mortgage payments, credit card payments, child support, and other loan payments) divided by the borrower's gross monthly income. The ratio is expressed as a percentage of the gross monthly income. Use GSE calculation.

name: CreditPerfRetailEstValueOfHouse
description: Estimated retail value of home.

name: CreditPerfRetailFICOMeth
description: Credit evaluation model used for the most recently obtained FICO score.

name: CreditPerfRetailFICOModelOrig
description: Indicates whether the FICO score was calculated using the Classic or Next Generation model.

name: CreditPerfRetailFICOScore
description: Numeric credit score for borrower (or co-borrower) resulting from credit evaluation model specified.

name: CreditPerfRetailHomeAppraisalDate
description: Date of the appraisal of the home.

name: CreditPerfRetailLenOfEmployment
description: The length of service to an employer from the start of employment until the date of the loan.

name: CreditPerfRetailLenOfHomeOwn
description: The length of time that the home has been owned.

name: CreditPerfRetailLoanToValueRatio
description: In the case of a purchase mortgage loan, the ratio obtained by dividing the original mortgage loan amount on the note date by the lesser of the mortgaged property appraised value on the note date or its purchase price. In the case of a refinance mortgage loan, the ratio obtained by dividing the original mortgage loan amount on the note date and the mortgaged property appraised value on the note date. In the case of a seasoned mortgage loan, if the Seller cannot warrant that the value of the mortgaged property has not declined since the note date, Freddie Mac requires that the Seller must provide a new appraisal value, which is used in the LTV calculation. Percentages below 6% or greater than 105% will be disclosed as 'Unknown,' indicated by a blank space. In the case of an FHA/VA mortgage loan, percentages less than 6% or greater than 110% will be disclosed as 'Unknown,' which will be indicated by a blank space.

name: CreditPerfRetailLoantoValueSource
description: Source of Loan to Value ratio if not calculated.

name: CreditPerfRetailMortgBalance
description: Amount of the balance on the mortgage.

name: CreditPerfRetailW2VerificationofEmployment
description: Indication whether employment has been verified throught the employees W2; if it has been verified, TRUE; if it has not been verified, FALSE.

name: CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefitPerWatt
description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: CurrentTransducerRatio
description: Current Transducer Ratio (CT Ratio).

name: Curtail
description: Amount of curtailment in kWh which is a reduction in the energy output of a generator from what it could otherwise produce given available resources (e.g., wind or sunlight).

name: CurtailEconomicModelFactorAmt
description: Amount of energy lost due to economic curtailment based on major design/energy production model. Economic curtailment is a result of wholesale market pricing, etc. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailEconomicModelFactorPct
description: Percentage of energy lost due to economic curtailment based on major design/energy production model. Economic curtailment is a result of wholesale market pricing, etc. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailEmergOrConstrModelFactorAmt
description: Amount of energy lost due to curtailment based on major design/energy production model for emergencies or construction work.To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailEmergOrConstrModelFactorPct
description: Percentage of energy lost due to curtailment from emergencies or construction work, based on major design/energy production model.To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailLimit
description: Curtailment limit on AC power during a period of time.

name: CurtailMeasPeriod
description: Time period over which curtailment is measured.

name: CurtailOtherModelFactorAmt
description: Amount of energy lost due to curtailment based on major design/energy production model due to reasons other than economics (wholesale market pricing or the like), stability, congestion, emergencies, or construction. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailOtherModelFactorPct
description: Percentage of energy lost due to curtailment caused by reasons other than economics (wholesale market pricing or the like), stability, congestion, emergencies, or construction. Value reported should be based on major design/energy production model. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailStabilityOrCongestionModelFactorAmt
description: Amount of energy lost due to stability or congestion curtailment on the transmission system, based on major design/energy production model. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailStabilityOrCongestionModelFactorPct
description: Percentage of energy lost due to stability or congestion curtailment on the transmission system, based on major design/energy production model. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailTotalModelFactorAmt
description: Amount of energy lost due to curtailment based on major design/energy production model.To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CurtailTotalModelFactorPct
description: Percentage of energy lost due to curtailment based on major design/energy production model. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, and the EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: CustomTestCond
description: Description of the test condition.

name: CustomTestCondAirMass
description: Air mass during the test condition.

name: CustomTestCondAmbTemp
description: Ambient temperature during the test condition. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: CustomTestCondCellTemp
description: Ambient temperature during the test condition. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: CustomTestCondIrradAmt
description: Amount of irradiance during the test condition.

name: CustomTestCondWindSpeed
description: Wind speed during the test condition.

name: CutSheetAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Cut Sheets are available. If they are available, TRUE; if they are not available, FALSE.

name: CutSheetDocLink
description: URI to the location of the Cut Sheet (Data Sheet)  published by the  manufacturer.

name: DAQCommProtocol
description: Communication protocol of the Data Acquisition System which can be Modbus, Zigbee, WIFI, or Ethernet.

name: DAQDocLink
description: Link to the documentation URI for the Data Acquisition System.

name: DAQIPAddr
description: IP address for the Data Acquisition System.

name: DAQLicenseExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Data Acquisition System license.

name: DAQLicenseExpense
description: Cost of the Data Acquisition System license.

name: DAQMfrContactAndTitle
description: Name and title of contact for Data Acquisition System.

name: DAQMfrEmailAddr
description: Email address for Data Acquisition System.

name: DAQMfrName
description: Name of Data Acquisition System manufacturer.

name: DAQModel
description: Model number of Data Acquisition System.

name: DAQNumOfUnits
description: Number of Data Acquisition Systems in a portfolio.

name: DCPowerDesign
description: DC Nameplate capacity which is the sum of module ratings at standard test conditions as defined in the design.

name: DataFilterCollectionSystem
description: Indicator that data passes checks for data collection system faults or outages.

name: DataFilterInstrumentAlignment
description: Indicator that data passes checks for alignment between an irradiance instrument and a PV system's plane of array.

name: DataFilterInverterClipping
description: Indicator that data passes checks for periods of inverter clipping or operating away from maximum power point tracking.

name: DataFilterMissing
description: Indicator that data passes tests that detect missing values.

name: DataFilterOutliers
description: Indicator that data passes tests for outlier values.

name: DataFilterOutsideRange
description: Indicator that data passes checks for values outside of acceptable range.

name: DataFilterShading
description: Indicator that data passes checks for periods of time where the irradiance instrument or PV system is shaded by nearby structures, soiling, snow, frost or other cause.

name: DataFilterStability
description: Indicator that data values pass checks for unstable values, e.g., where data values change more than a threshold in a time interval.

name: DataFilterVisual
description: Indicator that data pass checks by visual examination.

name: DataSelected
description: Indicates data inclusion or exclusion. True if data is retained; False if data is excluded.

name: DebtInstrumentPeriodicPmtInterestPerWatt
description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to interest. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: DebtInstrumentPeriodicPmtPrincipalPerWatt
description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: DeficitRestorationOblig
description: An amount contributed by a partner with a negative capital account balance that brings the account balance to zero when the partnership interest is liquidated, usually within 90 days or by the end of the tax year in which the partner's interest are sold.

name: DeficitRestorationObligLimit
description: Amount of the cap on the deficit restoration obligation.

name: DeficitRestorationObligLimitPerWatt
description: Limit to deficit restoration obligation. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: DeficitRestorationObligPerWatt
description: Amount of deficit restoration obligation in the reporting period. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: DemandCharge
description: The maximum amount of power (kW) drawn for any given time interval (typically 15 minutes) during the billing period, multiplied by the relevant demand charge ($/kW). Demand charges are fees applied to the electric bills of commercial and industrial customers based upon the highest amount of power drawn during any interval during the billing period.

name: DesignAndConstrDocCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Design and Construction Documents.

name: DesignAndConstrDocExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Design and Construction Documents or issues raised.

name: DesignAndConstrDocLink
description: Link to the Design And Construction document.

name: DesignAndConstrDocsAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Design and Construction Documents is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: DesignAndConstrDocsAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Design and Construction Documents or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: DesignAndConstrDocsAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Design and Construction Documents is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: DesignAttrPVACCap
description: Total AC Capacity of the system based on the design of the system and the manufacturer's expected capacity (calculated as DC X (1-derate factor)).

name: DesignAttrPVACRtg
description: Nominal AC power rating of the System based on the design of the system  in kWp.

name: DesignAttrPVDCCap
description: Total DC Capacity of the system based on the design of the system at Standard Test Conditions.

name: DeveloperGovernanceStruct

name: DeveloperISOExperience

name: DeveloperPastFunds

name: DeveloperPortfolioGuaranteeOutput

name: DeveloperPortfolioPerfGuarantee

name: DeveloperPortfolioPerfGuaranteeDocLink

name: DeveloperPortfolioPerfGuaranteeInitiationDate

name: DeveloperPortfolioPerfGuaranteeTerm
description: Term of the developer performance guarantee for the portfolio which may be in years or months. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: DeveloperPortfolioPerfType

name: DeveloperProjCommissAndPerfTesting

name: DeveloperProjPerfGuarantee

For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

description: Confirmation of the availability of the Interconnection Agreement in the Engineering, Procurement and Construction Agreement Agreement. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

name: EPCAgreePerfGuaranteeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Engineering Procurement and Construction performance guarantee that the project will perform at a certain level of energy output.

name: EPCAgreePerfGuaranteeInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Engineering Procurement and Construction performance guarantee that the project will perform at a certain level of energy output.

name: EPCAgreePerfGuaranteePct
description: Performance guarantee calculated as kWh as percent of P50 energy production.

name: EPCAgreePerfGuaranteeTerm
description: Term of the performance guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: EPCAgreePerfGuaranteeType
description: Description of the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement Performance Guarantee, indicating that the project will perform at a certain level of energy output.

name: EPCAgreeScopeofWork
description: Description of the scope of work outlined in the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement.

name: EPCAgreeSpecialFeat
description: Description of special features described in the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement.

name: EPCAgreeSubcontractorScopeofWork
description: Description of scope of work of the Engineering Procurement and Construction subcontractor.

name: EPCAgreeWarrExpDate
description: Engineering Procurement and Construction Warranty Expiration Date.

name: EPCAgreeWarrInitiationDate
description: Engineering Procurement and Construction Warranty Initiation Date.

name: EPCAgreeWarrTerm
description: Term of the warranty on the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: EPCAgreeWorkmanshipWarrAvail
description: Confirmation of the availability of the Workmanship Warranty per the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

name: EPCAgreeWorkmanshipWarrTerm
description: Term of the Workmanship Warranty in the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: EPCContractReviewConsidered
description: Indicates if the EPC contract review has been considered. If it has been considered, TRUE; if it has not been considered, FALSE.

name: EPCContractor
description: Company Name of the Engineering Procurement and Construction contractor on the contract.

name: EPCContractorTitle
description: Title of contact person at the Engineering Procurement and Construction contractor.

name: EasementRptAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Easement Report is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: EasementRptAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Easement Report or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: EasementRptAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Easement Report is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: EasementRptCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Easement Report.

name: EasementRptDocLink
description: Link to the Easement  document.

name: EasementRptEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Easement.

name: EasementRptExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Easement or issues raised.

name: EasementRptExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Easement.

name: EcologicalRptReviewed
description: Indicates if the econological/wildlife/plant life report has been reviewed. If it has been reviewed, TRUE; if it has not been reviewed, FALSE.

name: ElecGenerationRevenuePerWatt
description: Revenue from generation of electricity, a process of producing electric energy by transforming other forms of energy such as nuclear, fossil fuel, solar, geothermal, hydro, and wind. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: ElecInspctAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Electrical Inspection is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: ElecInspctAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Electrical Inspection or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: ElecInspctAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Electrical Inspection is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: ElecInspctCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Electrical Inspection.

name: ElecInspctDocLink
description: Link to the Electrical Inspection document.

name: ElecInspctEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Electrical Inspection.

name: ElecInspctExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Electrical Inspection or issues raised.

name: ElecInspctExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Electrical Inspection.

name: EmployeeFirstName
description: First name of the employee.

name: EmployeeFullName
description: Full name of the employee.

name: EmployeeLastName
description: Last name of the employee.

name: EmployeeRole
description: Description of the role of the employee, for example transaction documents or due diligence.

name: EmployeeRoleLevel
description: Indicates the level of the employee, for example, lead or support.

name: EmployeeRoleType
description: Indicates whether the employee role was on a fund or a project.

name: EmployeeTeam
description: Team name for the employee.

name: EmployeeTitle
description: Corporate title of the employee.

name: EndDateOfElecEnergyTest
description: Time stamp indicating last day of IEC 61724-3 test, administered under OD-402.

name: EndDateOfElecPowerTest
description: Time stamp indicating the final day of the IEC 61724-2 test, administered under OD-401 or OD-402.

name: EnergyAC
description: Energy (AC) measured for a period of time.

name: EnergyAvailComparison
description: Comparison of measured versus expected energy availability. This concepts reports the difference which is calculated as Measured – Expected.

name: EnergyBudgetDate
description: Date on which the budget was entered or corrected.

name: EnergyBudgetID
description: Identifier for the energy budget related to a site.

name: EnergyBudgetPeriodicity
description: Specifies periodicity of budget, for example monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, annual.

name: EnergyBudgetPhase
description: Identifies the phase of the budget, for example, closing, initial funding, final funding.

name: EnergyBudgetSource
description: Description of the source of the budget, for example, sponsor, internal or Independent Engineer.

name: EnergyBudgetStatus
description: Identifies the status of the budget, for example, preliminary, indicative or final.

name: EnergyBudgetSystemPerfDegradPct
description: Annual percent degradation of system performance.

name: EnergyBudgetVersion
description: Description of the version of the budget.

name: EnergyBudgetYear1CapFactorPct
description: First year capacity factor percent, pre-availability and curtailment

name: EnergyBudgetYear1EnergyYieldPct
description: First year output in megawatt hours (MWh) divided by megawatt hours at peak (MWp), pre-availability and curtailment.

name: EnergyBudgetYear1OutputEnergy
description: First year energy output in megawatt hours, pre-availability and curtailment.

name: EnergyCharge
description: The amount of energy (kWh) consumed, multiplied by the relevant price of energy ($/kWh) during the billing period.

name: EnergyContractRatePricePerEnergyUnit
description: Purchase price per unit of energy (i.e. 1 kWh) generated by the system.

name: EnergyReferenceYield
description: The measure of the total energy generated per kWp installed over a certain period of time.

name: EnergyUnavailComparison
description: Unavailability is a metric that quantifies the amount of energy lost when the system is not operating. This metric compares measured versus expected energy unavailability. This concepts reports the difference which is calculated as Measured – Expected.

name: EnergyUnavailExcludExtOrOtherOutagesComparison
description: Unavailability is a metric that quantifies the amount of energy lost when the system is not operating. This metric compares measured versus expected energy unavailability excluding times external or other outages. This concepts reports the difference which is calculated as Measured – Expected.

name: EntityAddr1

name: EntityAddr2

name: EntityAuthorizedToViewSecurityData

name: EntityAuthorizedToViewSecurityDataEmailPhone
description: Email and phone contact of individual or entity at the system authorized to view security data.

name: EntityCode
description: An entity code is a 2 to 6 character string comprised of upper-case letters and numbers (no hyphens). Each entity registers an entity code. Code should be chosen such that it is most recognizable. It is recommend that the entity code is either a truncated entity name or a stock ticker symbol.

name: EntityEmail
description: Email address of the entity.

name: EntityFitchCreditRtg
description: Fitch credit rating of the entity.

name: EntityID
description: UUID identifier for a specific entity.

name: EntityIsAssetMgr
description: Indicates if the entity or counterparty is an Asset Manager; if it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: EntityIsCOPBackupProvider

name: EntityLocCountry

name: EntityLocCounty

name: EntityLocState

name: EntityLocZipCode
description: ZIp Code where the entity is based.

name: EntityMoodysCreditRtg
description: Moodys credit rating of the entity.

name: EntityName

name: EntityParentCoLegalEntityID
description: Legal Entity Identifier of the parent company of the entity.

name: EntityPhoneNum
description: Phone number of the entity.

name: EntityRole
description: Primary role of the entity which can be one of the following: Asset Owner, Asset Owner Parent Company, General Contractor, Prime Contractor, Surety, Bond Agent, Insurance Broker, Developer Attorney, Corporate Attorney, Contract Attorney, Environmental Attorney, Land-Use Attorney, Tax Attorney, Litigation Attorney, Interconnecting Utility as Authority Having Jurisdiction, Permitting Authority as Authority Having Jurisdiction, Regional Transmission Operator as Authority Having Jurisdiction, Independent System Operator as Authority Having Jurisdiction, Environmental Consultant, Equipment Factory Auditor, Independent Engineer, Insurance Consultant, Equipment Reliability Test Lab, Tax Consultant, Transmission Consultant, Appraiser, Weather Data Provider, Utility, REC Offtaker, General Contractor, Engineering Contractor/Installer, Construction Contractor/Installer, Subcontractor Contractor/Installer, Builders/Construction All-Risk Insurers, Ocean Cargo Insurer, General Liability Insurer, Automobile Liability Insurer, Workers Compensation Insurer, Umbrella/Excess Liability Insurer, Pollution Liability Insurer, Property Insurer, Business Interruption Insurer, Project Performance Insurer, Construction Lender, Back-leverage Lender, Commercial Lender, Personal Lender, LLC Partner Managing Member, LLC Partner Voting Member, LLC Partner Passive Member, Project Developer, Project Host, Long-term Equity Investor, Tax-equity Investor, Lessor, Asset Manager, Back-up Asset Manager, Collateral Agent, Energy Price Forecaster, Hedge Provider, Monitoring Service Provider, Back-up Monitoring Service Provider, Parallel Monitoring Service Provider, Operator, Back-up Operator, Maintenance Provider, Back-up Maintenance Provider, Scheduling Coordinator, Site Security Company, Subcontractor, Telecom Provider, Trustee, Energy Forecasting Service, Equipment Warranty Provider, Construction Warranty Provider, Site Owner/Site Control, Equipment Manufacturer, PPA Offtaker, COP Backup Provider, Bank.

name: EntitySizeACPower

name: EnvSiteAssess

name: EnvSiteAssessRptIssueDate

For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: EquityContribGuaranteeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Equity Contribution Guarantee is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: EquityContribGuaranteeDocLink
