name: EquityContribGuaranteeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Equity Contribution Guarantee or issues raised.

name: EquityContribGuaranteeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Equity Contribution Guarantee.

name: EstArrayDegradRate
description: Estimated percent capacity of the array lost in future periods, e.g., year, month, due to degradation. Should be used with the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: EstSystemDegradRate
description: Estimated degradation rate of the system, in percent of kWh lost. To report estimated values for specified future periods, use the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis, in conjunction with the concept EstimationPeriodForCurtailment.

name: EstimationPeriodForCurtail
description: Period in which the curtailment amount or percent is estimated, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days, or 'P1Y' represents a reported fact for one year, or 'P1M' represents a reported fact for one month. Should be used with the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis which represents the starting date for the period.

name: EstimationPeriodForDegradMeas
description: Period in which the degradation amount or percent is estimated, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days, or 'P1Y' represents a reported fact for one year, or 'P1M' represents a reported fact for one month. Should be used with the EstimationPeriodStartDateAxis which represents the starting date for the period.

name: EstoppelCertPPAAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: EstoppelCertPPAAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: EstoppelCertPPAAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: EstoppelCertPPACntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement.

name: EstoppelCertPPADocLink
description: Link to the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement document.

name: EstoppelCertPPAEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement.

name: EstoppelCertPPAExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement or issues raised.

name: EstoppelCertPPAExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Estoppel Certificate Power Purchase Agreement.

name: ExciseAndSalesTaxPerWatt
description: The amount of excise and sales taxes included in sales and revenues, which are then deducted as a cost of sales. Includes excise taxes, which are applied to specific types of transactions or items (such as gasoline or alcohol); and sales, use and value added taxes, which are applied to a broad class of revenue-producing transactions involving a wide range of goods and services.  Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: ExpectEnergyAtArrayDC
description: Expected energy in DC kWh produced at the array. This element should be used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of measurement.

name: ExpectEnergyAtP50
description: Expected system production at P50 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 50%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

name: ExpectEnergyAtP75
description: Expected system production at P75 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 75%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

name: ExpectEnergyAtP90
description: Expected system production at P90 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 90%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

name: ExpectEnergyAtP95
description: Expected system production at P95 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 95%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

name: ExpectEnergyAtP99
description: Expected system production at P99 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 99%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

name: ExpectEnergyAtRevenueMeterInceptToDate
description: Expected Active Electrical Production at the revenue meter for indicated time period in kWh per IEC 61724-3 using measured weather data during times of availability and including adjustments for parasitic losses. See Section 6.6.6 of IEC 61724-3. Measured from inception to date.

name: ExpectEnergyAtTheRevenueMeter
description: Expected Active Electrical Production at the revenue meter for indicated time period in kWh per IEC 61724-3 using measured weather data during times of availability and including adjustments for parasitic losses. See Section 6.6.6 of IEC 61724-3.  This element is defined as the sum of electrical production over a period of time, for example the first day of the month to the last day of the month, and has a period type of duration. This should not be used with the Period [Axis].

name: ExpectEnergyAtTheRevenueMeterForPeriod
description: Expected Active Electrical Production at the revenue meter for indicated time period in kWh per IEC 61724-3 using measured weather data during times of availability and including adjustments for parasitic losses. See Section 6.6.6 of IEC 61724-3. This element can be used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of measurement and has a period type of instant to measure a point in time. If no Period [Axis] is used, the time period for the value is from the date of the value in the instance document to the end of the life of the system.

name: ExpectEnergyAtUnavailTimes
description: A PV system or part of a system is considered to be unavailable when it’s status is observed to be non-functional.This measure reports the amount of energy that is unavailable.

name: ExpectEnergyAtUnavailTimesExcludExtOrOtherOutages
description: A PV system or part of a system is considered to be unavailable when it’s status is observed to be non-functional.This measure reports the amount of energy that is unavailable, excluding issues that are outside of the plant's control.

name: ExpectEnergyAvailEstRatio
description: Expected Energy Availability Estimate is modelled predicted energy for unity availability, and can be calculated by dividing ExpectedEnergyAtTheRevenueMeter by Predicted_Energy_Availability. This element can be used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period such as year and has a period type of instant to measure a point in time.

name: ExpectEnergyAvailableExcludExtOrOtherOutages
description: Expected energy available excluding times of external or other outage causes per IEC 61724-3 Section 6.8.1.

name: ExpectInsolationAtP50
description: Expected average P50 insolation generated in kWh per square meter. The value can be reported for the period defined on the PeriodAxis, for example to record the average insolation for Q1, this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis.

name: ExpectInsolationAtP50InceptToDate
description: Expected average P50 insolation generated in kWh per square meters from inception to date.

name: ExposureRptAvailOfExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Exposure Report. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: ExposureRptAvailOfFinalRpt
description: Indicates if the Exposure Report is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: ExposureRptAvailOfRpt
description: Indicates if the Exposure Report is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: ExposureRptDocLink
description: Link to the Exposure Report document.

name: ExposureRptEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Exposure Report.

name: ExposureRptExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Exposure Report.

name: ExposureRptExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Exposure Report.

name: FWVersion
description: Description of the firmware version of the device.

name: FilterIrradMax
description: Upper limit on irradiance.

name: FilterIrradMin
description: Lower limit on irradiance.

name: FilterIrradStabilityMax
description: Maximum coefficient of variation (ratio of standard deviation to mean) of irradiance during a window of data.

name: FilterIrradStabilityWindowLen
description: Duration of a window for determining irradiance stability.

name: FilterPowerACMax
description: Upper limit on AC power.

name: FilterPowerACMin
description: Lower limit on AC power.

name: FilterTempAmbMax
description: Upper limit on ambient air temperature.

name: FilterTempAmbMin
description: Upper limit on ambient air temperature.

name: FilterWindSpeedMax
description: Upper limit on wind speed.

name: FilterWindSpeedMin
description: Lower limit on wind speed.

name: FinContractForSystemEscalatorPct
description: I solar company.

name: FinContractForSystemLenInMon
description: I solar company.

name: FinContractForSystemOfftakerName
description: I customers.

name: FinContractForSystemPaceEligibility
description: I solar company, is eligible for the PACE program.

name: FinContractForSystemRate
description: I solar company, related to the system, in amount of kWh.

name: FinContractForSystemType
description: I solar company, which can be Lease, PPA, Loan, Cash, Upfront, PSA or Unknown.

name: FinContractForSystemUpFrontPurch
description: I solar company.

name: FinElectricityCost
description: Grid electricity cost in currency per kWh.

name: FinElectricityExpense
description: Cost of electricity from the utility.

name: FinEventDate
description: Date on which the financing event occurred.

name: FinEventDesc
description: Description of the individual financing event, for example, closing or initial funding.

name: FinEventFirstFinEntity
description: Name of first entity providing project financing.

name: FinEventFirstFinEntityEmail
description: Email address for the first entity providing project financing.

name: FinEventFirstFinLoanNum
description: Loan number for the first loan made.

name: FinEventFundOrProj
description: Indication as to whether the financing event is related to the total fund or an individual portfolio.

name: FinEventID
description: Identifier for the financing event, for example, an origination request, signing a non-binding commitment, signing a binding commitment, signing and closing, closing, or funding.

name: FinEventLoanForm
description: Loan form and version number used for the loan used in project financing.

name: FinEventLoanNum
description: Account number for the loan.

name: FinEventStatus
description: Description of the status of the financing event, for example, In Process or Finalized.

name: FinEventType
description: Description of the type of financing event, for example, an origination request, signing a non-binding commitment, signing a binding committment, signing and closing, closing, or funding.

name: FinLeaseSchedAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Financial Lease Schedule is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: FinLeaseSchedAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Financial Lease Schedule or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: FinLeaseSchedAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Financial Lease Schedule is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: FinLeaseSchedCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Financial Lease Schedule.

name: FinLeaseSchedDocLink
description: Link to the Financial Lease Schedule document.

name: FinLeaseSchedEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Financial Lease Schedule.

name: FinLeaseSchedExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Financial Lease Schedule or issues raised.

name: FinLeaseSchedExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Financial Lease Schedule.

name: FinPerfActualIncentivesToExpect
description: Ratio of actual revenue based incentives divided by the expected revenue based incentives per month.

name: FinPerfActualIncentivesToExpectInceptToDate
description: Ratio of actual revenue based incentives divided by the expected revenue based incentives from inception to date.

name: FinPerfActualOpExpToExpect
description: Actual operating expenses divided by expected operating expenses per month.

name: FinPerfActualOpExpToExpectInceptToDate
description: Actual operating expenses divided by expected operating expenses from inception to date.

name: FinPerfActualPPARevenueToExpect
description: Actual Power Purchase Agreement Revenue divided by expected Power Purchase Agreement revenue per month.

name: FinPerfActualPPARevenueToExpectInceptToDate
description: Actual Power Purchase Agreement Revenue divided by expected Power Purchase Agreement revenue inception to date.

name: FinPerfActualRECRevenueToExpect
description: Actual renewable energy credit revenue divided by expected renewable energy credit revenue.

name: FinPerfActualRECRevenueToExpectInceptToDate
description: Actual renewable energy credit revenue divided by expected renewable energy credit from inception to date.

name: FinPerfCollateralAcctBalance
description: Actual or forecast collateral account balance. Values reported as forecast should use the StatementScenarioAxis.

name: FinPerfCommExpense
description: Communications expense which is typically the monthly telephone bill.

name: FinPerfDataMonitorHostingExpense
description: Cost of data monitoring and hosting

name: FinPerfEarnBeforeIncomeTaxDeprecAndAmort
description: Earnings before income tax, depreciation or amortization, actual and forecast. (EBITDA). Values reported as forecast should use the StatementScenarioAxis.

name: FinPerfEquipCalibrationExpense
description: Cost of calibrating equipment which usually only applies to the pyranometer.

name: FinPerfEstsCollateralAcctBalanceEst
description: Collateral account balance, estimate made at start of project.

name: FinPerfEstsEarnBeforeIncomeTaxDeprecAndAmortEst
description: Earnings before income tax, depreciation and amortization, estimate made at start of project.

name: FinPerfEstsFutureSurplusCashToDeveloperEst
description: Future surplus cash to developer, estimate made at start of project.

name: FinPerfEstsLeaseRentPmtNetOfCollateralAcctEst
description: Lease rent payments, net of collateral account, estimate made at start of project.

name: FinPerfEstsRevenuesEst
description: Revenues, estimate made at start of project.

name: FinPerfExpectAuditingExpense
description: Expected auditing expense.

name: FinPerfFutureSurplusCashToDeveloper
description: Future surplus cash to developer, actual or forecast. Values reported as forecast should use the StatementScenarioAxis.

name: FinPerfLeaseRentPmtNetOfCollateralAcct
description: Lease rent payments, net of collateral amount, actual or forecast. Values reported as forecast should use the StatementScenarioAxis.

name: FinPerfReserveBalance
description: Reserve balance, actual.

name: FinPerfStateTaxCred
description: State tax credits, actual or forecast. Values reported as forecast should use the StatementScenarioAxis.

name: FinPerfSurplusCashAppliedToCollateralAcct
description: Surplus cash applied to collateral account, actual or forecast. Values reported as forecast should use the StatementScenarioAxis.

name: FinTxnForFundAmt
description: Amount of the financial transaction related to the fund.

name: FinTxnForFundCntrpartyName
description: Name of the counterparty to the transaction related to the fund.

name: FinTxnForFundDateOfTxn
description: Date of the financial transaction related to the fund.

name: FinTxnForFundInvoiceLineItem
description: Text of line item on the invoice for the financial transaction related to the Fund.

name: FinTxnForSystemAmt
description: Amount of the financial transaction related to the system.

name: FinTxnForSystemCntrpartyName
description: Name of the counterparty to the transaction related to the system.

name: FinTxnForSystemDateOfTxnForSystem
description: Date of the financial transaction related to the system.

name: FinTxnForSystemInvoiceLineItem
description: Text of line item on the invoice for the financial transaction related to the system.

name: FinTxnForSystemSubType
description: Description of a custom transaction that is unique to a fund or billing entity.

name: FinTxnType
description: Type of financial transaction which can be Credit Applied, Customer Payment, Customer Bill, Credit, Expected Prepayment, Expected Rebate, Fund Rebate, Operating Expenses, Lease Management Fee, PPA Operations and Maintenance, Lease Operations and Maintenance, PPA Miscellaneous Expenses, PPA Management Fee, Lease Miscellaneous Expenses, Lease Insurance, PPA Insurance, PPA Transaction Manager Fee, Lease Transaction Manager Fee, Customer Prepayment, ACH Settlement Credit, Principal Cash Paid to Beneficiary, Contribution to Principal Cash, Book Transfer Debit, Teller Deposit Credit, Book Transfer Credit, or Remote Deposit Credit.

name: FinanceOverviewBeneficiaryOfGuarantee
description: Name of the beneficiary of the Parent Guaranty, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: FinanceOverviewIncentivesDesc
description: Description of the incentives for the project.

name: FinanceOverviewInterconnAgreeDesc
description: Description of the Interconnection Agreement.

name: FinanceOverviewOMContractDesc
description: Description of the Operations and Maintenance contract.

name: FinanceOverviewTypeOfProj
description: Description of the type of project.

name: FireRiskRptSubmitted
description: Indicates if the fire risk report has been submitted. If it has been submitted, TRUE; if it has not been submitted, FALSE.

name: FundAttrSubsetID
description: Identifier used to link a subset of attributes within a fund, for example grouping the characteristics of a portion of a fund owned by a particular entity.

name: FundBankInvest
description: Description of the type of investment the bank has made in the fund, for example did they invest on the initial round or were they assigned a portion by another investor.

name: FundBankRole
description: Description of the banks role in the fund. For example, the bank could be Co-Investor, Lead Investor, Single Investor, or have some other role.

name: FundClosingDate
description: Date on which the fund closed.

name: FundConstrFin
description: Indicates that the fund has construction financing. If the fund does have construction financing, TRUE. If it does not, FALSE.

name: FundDebtFin
description: Indicates that the fund has financing debt. If the fund does have financing debt, TRUE. If it does not, FALSE.

name: FundDescAnalyst
description: Name of analyst covering the fund.

name: FundDescAvailOfExpenseSinkingFund
description: Availability of Expense Sinking Fund which is a reserve account to pay for expenses. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

name: FundDescAvgPPATerm
description: Average term in years of Power Purchase Agreement within a fund. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: FundDescCurrentSimplePaybackEndDate
description: End date of simple payback period.

name: FundDescCurrentSimplePaybackStartDate
description: Start date of simple payback period.

name: FundDescEarliestCommercOpDate
description: Earliest commercial operation date.

name: FundDescFundComment
description: Comment about a fund.

name: FundDescFundCrossCollateralized
description: Indication that fund is cross collateralized. If cross collateralized, TRUE; if not cross collateralized, FALSE.

name: FundDescFundInitialFundDate
description: Date of initial funding.

name: FundDescFundNameplateCapInverterskWac
description: Nameplate capacity in kWac of inverters for all projects in the fund.

name: FundDescFundNameplateCapPVArraykWdc
description: Nameplate capacity of PV arrays for all projects in the fund in kWdc

name: FundDescFundType
description: Description of type of fund.

name: FundDescInvestorHoldingCoName
description: Name of fund investor holding company.

name: FundDescLegalCounsel
description: Name of fund legal counsel.

name: FundDescNameOfTaxEquityProvider
description: Name of tax equity provider.

name: FundDescNumOfSystemsInFund
description: Number of systems in a fund.

name: FundDescNumOneStrength
description: Description of most important strength of the fund.

name: FundDescNumOneWeakness
description: Description of most important weakness of the fund.

name: FundDescNumberofOffTakersInFund
description: Number of off takers of power, Renewable Energy Credits or other revenue sources in a fund.

name: FundDescPriceAdvisor
description: Name of pricing advisor which is the individual who runs the pricing model and could be the banker.

name: FundDescProFormaGrossIncomeBalance
description: Amount of the Pro Forma gross income balance.

name: FundDescProFormaNetIncomeBalance
description: Amount of the proforma net income balance.

name: FundDescPropertyInsurHurricaneWindRequirement
description: Description of property insurance to cover hurricane/wind requirement.

name: FundDescPropertyInsurPollutionRequirement
description: Description of property insurance to cover pollution requirement.

name: FundDescSector
description: Name of the fund sector, for example, commercial, retail, or municipal.

name: FundDescShortestPPATerm
description: Term of the shortest Power Purchase Agreement within the fund. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: FundDescSponsorCoName
description: Name of sponsor who brings the project to the bank. It is usually the project developer.

name: FundDescSponsorName
description: Name of the sponsor who brings the project to the bank.

name: FundDescTaxEquityProviderContrib
description: Amount of contribution of tax equity provider.

name: FundDescTrustCo
description: Name of the trustee.

name: FundFinType
description: Description of the type of financing structure, for example, Partnership, Sale/Leaseback, Other.

name: FundID
description: A line item used to identify the fund. This must use the identifier defined on the FundIdentifierAxis.

name: FundInvestFocus
description: Description of fund investment focus (for example, renewable only, contracted cash flows only), competitive advantage, and project drop-down expectations which describes the plans for the long term equity of the project.

name: FundMemoAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Funding Memo is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: FundMemoAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Funding Memo or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: FundMemoAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Funding Memo is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: FundMemoCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Funding Memo.

name: FundMemoDocLink
description: Link to the Funding Memo document.

name: FundMemoEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Funding Memo.

name: FundMemoExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Funding Memo or issues raised.

name: FundMemoExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Funding Memo.

name: FundName
description: Internal name for the fund.

name: FundProposalReqAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the funding proposal request is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: FundProposalReqAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the funding proposal request. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: FundProposalReqAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the funding proposal request is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: FundProposalReqCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the funding proposal request.

name: FundProposalReqDocLink
description: Link to the funding proposal Request document.

name: FundProposalReqEffectDate
description: Effective date of the funding proposal request.

name: FundProposalReqExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the funding proposal request.

name: FundProposalReqExpDate
description: Expiration date of the funding proposal request.

name: FundSolarAssets
description: Indicates that the fund has solar projects in it. If the fund does have solar projects, TRUE. If it does not, FALSE.

name: FundSponsorID
description: Identifier for the Sponsor in the fund.

name: FundStatus
description: Description of the status of the fund, for example, it is closed, open, committed.

name: FundStorageAssets
description: Indicates that the fund has storage projects in it. If the fund does have storage projects, TRUE. If it does not, FALSE.

name: FundWindAssets
description: Indicates that the fund has wind projects in it. If the fund does have wind projects, TRUE. If it does not, FALSE.

name: FundsDescCapitalContrib
description: Purchase price of project.

name: FundsDescCostOfFunds
description: Cost of interest expense incurred.

name: FundsFlowABANum
description: American Bankers Association routing number for funds flow wire instructions.

name: FundsFlowAcctName
description: Account Name for funds flow wire instructions for parties involved in the transaction.

name: FundsFlowAcctNum
description: Account Number for funds flow wire instructions.

name: FundsFlowDistributionAmt
description: Amount of money being distributed, multiple amounts going to different recipients.

name: FundsFlowRecipient
description: Name of the individual receiving the funds.

name: FundsFlowReference
description: Note describing how the distributed funds will be used.

name: GenTieLineLen
description: Length of Gen Tie Line (interconnecting power line).

name: GeneralInsurExpensePerWatt
description: The expense in the period incurred with respect to protection provided by insurance entities against risks other than risks associated with production (which are allocated to cost of sales). Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: GeoLocAtEntrance
description: Latitude and longitude at system entrance in degrees. Note that values reported for this concept are different than values reported for Latitude and Longitude at the revenue meter.

name: GeotechnicalRptReviewed
description: Indicates if the geotechnical report has been reviewed. If it has been reviewed, TRUE; if it has not been reviewed, FALSE.

name: GridCodeCompliance
description: Indicates if the IEC 62445-1 or local Grid Code Compliance has been met. If it has been met, TRUE; if it has not been met, FALSE

name: GuaranteeAmtCap
description: Maximum amount of money that can be refunded to the guarantee.

name: GuaranteeBeneficiary
description: Beneficiary of the guarantee.

name: GuaranteeCommencementDate
description: Start date of the guarantee.

name: GuaranteeDocLink
description: Link to the guarantee document.

name: GuaranteeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the guarantee.

name: GuaranteeGuarantor
description: Name of the guarantor.

name: GuaranteeMeasUnits
description: Description of units used to measure the guarantee. For example, performance guarantees require certain level of energy output (kWh).

name: GuaranteeName
description: Name of the guarantee.

name: GuaranteeOblig
description: Guaranteed obligation amount.

name: GuaranteePmtMax
description: Maximum payment that can be made during a reconciliation period.

name: GuaranteePmtScalingFactor
description: Percent that the guarantee is willing to pay of the loss incurred, for example, may specify that 50% of the lost revenue will be paid.

name: GuaranteeReconciliationPeriod
description: Period within which the guarantee must be met, for example, year or month.

name: GuaranteeTerm
description: Term of the guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: HedgeAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Hedge Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: HedgeAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Hedge Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: HedgeAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Hedge Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: HedgeAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Hedge Agreement.

name: HedgeAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Hedge Agreement document.

name: HedgeAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Hedge Agreement.

name: HedgeAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Hedge Agreement or issues raised.

name: HedgeAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Hedge Agreement.

name: HeightAboveGround
description: Height above ground level

name: HostAckAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Host Acknowledgement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: HostAckAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Host Acknowledgement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: HostAckAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Host Acknowledgement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: HostAckCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Host Acknowledgement.

name: HostAckDocLink
description: Link to the Host Acknowledgement document.

name: HostAckEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Host Acknowledgement.

name: HostAckExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Host Acknowledgement or issues raised.

name: HostAckExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Host Acknowledgement.

name: HumidityRelative
description: Ratio between the amount of moisture in the air and the maximum amount of moisture that could be present in the air at current air temperature.

name: HypotheticalLiquidationAtBookValueBalance
description: Amount the partners would receive if the partnership were liquidated at book value at the end of each measurement period.

name: HypotheticalLiquidationAtBookValueBalancePerWatt
description: The total Hypothetical Liquidation at Book Value balance at the end of the reporting period. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: IECRECertDate
description: Date the IECRE certificate was issued.

name: IECRECertHolder
description: Name of entity contracting with (paying) the IECRE CB (Certification Body).

name: IECRECertNum
description: IECRE certificate number, defined as sector(PV, wind, marine).year.IECREOperativeDocument.uniquesystemid.certificatenumber. For example AAAA.YYYY.OD4XX.PPPPP.CCCCC.AAAA.

name: IECRECertTimeStamp
description: Timestamp for completion of the IECRE commissioning.

name: IECRECertifyingBody
description: IECRE Certifying Body (CB) who issued the certificate.

name: IECREInspctBody
description: IECRE Inspection Body (IB) responsible for the inspection.

name: IECREOpDocCertType
description: IECRE Certificate Type: OD-403-1 (PV system Design Qualification Certificate, Part 1 PV Site Qualification), OD-403-2 (PV system Design Qualification Certificate, Part 2 PV Power Block Design Qualification), OD-403 (PV system Design Qualification Certificate),OD401-1 (PV Conditional PV system Certificate: Part 1 PV Construction Completion), OD-401 (Conditional PV Project Certificate), OD-402 (Annual PV system Performance Certificate), OD-404 (PV Asset Transfer Certificate), OD-409 (PV system Decommissioning Certificate); reference www.iecre.org/documents/refdocs/

name: IECRERulesOfProcedureMet
description: Indicates if IEC RE Rules Of Procedure have been met. If it has been met, TRUE; if it has not been met, FALSE

name: IncentiveAssignAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Incentive Assignment is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: IncentiveAssignAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Incentive Assignment or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: IncentiveAssignAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Incentive Assignment is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: IncentiveAssignCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Incentive Assignment.

name: IncentiveAssignDocLink
description: Link to the Incentive Assignment document.

name: IncentiveAssignEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Incentive Assignment.

name: IncentiveAssignExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Incentive Assignment or issues raised.

name: IncentiveAssignExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Incentive Assignment.

name: IncentiveFederalTaxIncentiveIndemnityCap
description: Cap on indemnity that the investor receives from the project developer for potential investment tax credit recapture per the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: IncentiveFederalTaxIncentiveIndemnityProvider
description: Provider of indemnification, for example, the developer/sponsor, per the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: IncentiveFederalTaxIncentiveType
description: Description of federal tax incentive indemnity type per the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: IncentiveNameOfRecipient
description: Name of the individual or organization who can take advantage of the incentive.

name: IncentivePBIAmendmentExecutionDate
description: Execution date of the performance based incentive amendment.

name: IncentivePBIAmendmentExpDate
description: Expiration date of the performance based incentive term.

name: IncentivePBIAmendmentInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the performance based incentive term.

name: IncentivePBIEscalator
description: Annual escalation of the performance based incentive value (percent)

name: IncentivePBIFirmVolume
description: Guaranteed volume of energy in kWh to be delivered by the project company under the terms of the Performace Based Incentive Contract.

name: IncentivePBIInvoicingDate
description: Invoice date for the performance based incentive.

name: IncentivePBIPmtDeadline
description: Date of the payment deadline for the performance based incentive.

name: IncentivePBIPmtMeth
description: Description of the payment method for the performance based incentive.

name: IncentivePBIPortionOfSite
description: Portion of site used to measure performance based incentive as percent of total number of units in site.

name: IncentivePBIProgram
description: Description of the performance based incentive program.

name: IncentivePBIRate
description: Rate of the performance based incentive in amount per kWh.

name: IncentivePBITerm
description: Term of the performance based incentive. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: IncentivePctFederalInvestTaxCreditVestedPct
description: The percent of the federal Investment Tax Credit that has been vested.

name: IncentivePerfActualIncentivesInceptToDate
description: Actual incentive cost from inception to date, cumulative per month, cumulative per year.

name: IncentivePerfExpectIncentivesInceptToDate
description: Expected cumulative incentive cost from inception to date.

name: IncentivePerfExpectIncentivesPerProdInceptToDate
description: Expected incentive cost per kWh production from inception to date, cumulative per month, cumulative per year.

name: IncentivePerfIncentiveType
description: Description of type of incentive.

name: IncentivePortionUnits
description: Number of units used to measure power system capacity for performance based incentive.

name: IncentiveRebateAmt
description: Amount of the rebate coming from the state.

name: IncentiveRebatePmtTiming
description: Description of rebate payment timing, for example monthly or quarterly payment.

name: IncentiveRebateProgram
description: Description of the rebate program.

name: IncentiveRebateType
description: Description of rebate type.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCred
description: State tax credit in currency per kWh.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCredCurrent
description: Indication as to whether state tax credits are current. If they are current, TRUE; if they are not current, FALSE.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCredEscalator
description: Percent of state tax credit escalator.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCredTerm
description: Term of the state tax credit. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCreditFirmVolume
description: Guaranteed volume of energy to be delivered as part of the state tax credit agreement (in kWh).

name: IncentiveStateTaxCreditPortionOfSite
description: State tax credit percentage of site based on units.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCreditPortionUnits
description: Number of units used to measure power system capacity for state tax credit.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCreditProgram
description: Description of the state tax credit program.

name: IncentiveStateTaxCreditRecipient

description: Amount of continuous DC power that can be drawn into the battery for the inverter, in apparent power.

name: InverterBatteryInputNumOfBatteriesPerInverter
description: Number of batteries required per inverter.

name: InverterBatteryInputPeakPowerDC
description: Peak apparent power that can be drawn into the battery for the inverter.

name: InverterBatteryInputSupportedBatteryTypes
description: Description of battery types that can be used to support the inverter.

description: Indicates if the inverter has a built-in meter. If it has a built-in meter, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: InverterCECWtEfficPct
description: California Energy Commission (CEC) weighted energy efficiency rating of the inverter. In contrast to peak efficiency, it is a measure of average efficiency.

name: InverterCertListing
description: Description of certifications available for the inverter.

name: InverterComm
description: Description of the communication system for the inverter.

name: InverterContPowerRtgAt40DegC
description: Inverter continuous power rating at 40 degrees celsius.

name: InverterCooling
description: Description of the inverter cooling system.

name: InverterCutSheetNotes
description: Descriptive notes about the inverter to be used on a cut sheet.

name: InverterDCOpt
description: Indication as to whether the inverter is DC optimized. If DC optimized, TRUE; if not DC optimized, FALSE.

name: InverterDepth
description: Depth of the Inverter.

name: InverterDesignFactor
description: Multiplier indicating the amount that the inverter can operate at above the inverter DC nameplate capacity. For example, at a design factor of 1.1, can safely operate 10% above the stated nameplate capacity rating.

name: InverterDisconnectionType
description: Description of the inverter disconnection type.

name: InverterEUEfficRtgPct
description: European Efficiency rating of the inverter which is an averaged operating efficiency over a yearly power distribution corresponding to middle-Europe climate.

name: InverterEfficAtVmaxPct
description: Percent efficiency rating of the inverter at vmax with a specified inverter power level. Vmax is the maximum DC input voltage of the inverter in DC.

name: InverterEfficAtVminPct
description: Percent efficiency rating of the inverter at vmin with a specified inverter power level. Vmin is the lowest possible operating voltage needed for energy efficiency and reliability optimization.

name: InverterEfficAtVnomPct
description: Percent efficiency rating of the inverter at vnom with a specified inverter power level. Vnom is nominal input voltage of the inverter in DC.

name: InverterEnclosureEnvRtg
description: Description of the enclosure environmental rating for the inverter.

name: InverterErrorCodeData
description: Error code data provided about the inverter.

name: InverterFWVersionTested
description: Version of firmware for the inverter that has been tested, for example, A.4.0.B, B.4.2.2, C.2.0.0.

name: InverterFanStatusFlag
description: Status of the inverter fan. If fan is working, TRUE; if fan is not working, FALSE.

name: InverterGFDIDesc
description: Description of the Inverter Ground Fault Detector Interrupter which is a fuse that trips when ground fault current exceeds the ampere rating of the fuse.

name: InverterGFDIThreshold
description: Threshold amount of current in the Inverter Ground Fault Detector Interrupter which is a fuse that trips when ground fault current exceeds the ampere rating of the fuse.

name: InverterGndAvail
description: Indication as to whether grounding is available for the inverter. If Ungrounded (Transformerless), FALSE. If Grounded, TRUE.

name: InverterHarmonicsTheshold
description: Expected percent limit of the change in frequency from expected frequency which is the harmonics, a method of characterizing the flow of the current. For example, the frequency is expected to be less than 4% of the expected frequency.

name: InverterHasCertIEC61683
description: Inverter has certification IEC61683, for Power Conditioners - Procedure for Measuring Efficiency.

name: InverterHasCertIEC62109-1
description: Inverter has certification IEC62109-1, for Safety of Power Converters ofr Use in PV Power Systems, Part 1: General Requirements.

name: InverterHasCertIEC62109-2
description: Inverter has certification IEC62109-2, Safety of Power Converters for Use in PV Power Systems, Part 2: Particular Requirements for Inverters.

name: InverterHasCertOther
description: Inverter has certification other than UL1741, IEC61683, IEC62109-1, or IEC62109-2. If it does, then list the certifications.

name: InverterHasCertUL1741
description: Inverter has certification UL1741, for Inverters, Converters, Controllers and Interconnection System Equipment for Use with Distributed Energy Resources.

name: InverterHasCertUL1741SA
description: Inverter has certification UL1741 Supplement A, for Inverters, Converters, Controllers and Interconnection System Equipment for Use with Distributed Energy Resources.

name: InverterHasDCDisconnectDevice
description: Indication as to whether the inverter has a DC disconnect device; if it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: InverterHasGroundFaultMonitor
description: Indication as to whether the inverter has a ground fault monitoring; if it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: InverterInputMaxMPPVoltage
description: Maximum voltage at which the inverter can deliver its rated power

name: InverterInputMaxOpCurrentDC
description: The maximum input DC current that can be connected to the inverter.

name: InverterInputMaxPowerDC
description: Maximum amount of apparent power input that the inverter can safely draw.

name: InverterInputMaxVoltageDC
description: Maximum rated DC voltage input of the inverter.

name: InverterInputMinMPPVoltage
description: Minimum voltage at which the inverter can deliver its rated power

name: InverterInputMinVoltageDC
description: Minimum rated DC voltage input of the inverter.

name: InverterInputNumOfMPPTTrackers
description: Number of Maximum Power Point Trackers (MPPT).

name: InverterInputRatedVoltageDC
description: Rated DC voltage of the inverter.

name: InverterInputShortCircuitCurrentDC
description: Amount of current going through the inverter when the voltage is zero.

name: InverterInputStringsPerMPPTNum
description: Number of strings or input per Maximum Power Point (MPPT).

name: InverterIsGridSupportUtilityInteractive
description: Indicates if the inverter is Grid Support Utility Interactive. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: InverterIsMPPT
description: Indicates if the inverter is an MPPT inverter. The MPPT is a circuit (typically a DC to DC converter) used to maximize the energy available from the connected solar module arrays at any time during its operation. If it is an MMPT inverter, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: InverterIsMicroInverter
description: Indicates if the inverter is a microinverter. If it is a microinverter, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: InverterIsUtilityInteractiveFlag
description: Indicates if the inverter is Utility Interactive. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: InverterLen
description: Length of the Inverter.

name: InverterMPPTOpRangeVoltageMax
description: Inverter Maximum Power Point Tracking maximum operating voltage range.

name: InverterMPPTOpRangeVoltageMin
description: Inverter Maximum Power Point Tracking minimum operating voltage range.

name: InverterMaxEffic
description: The ratio of output power (or energy) to input power (or energy) for the inverter.

name: InverterMaxStartVoltage
description: The maximum start voltage of an inverter is the maximum voltage at which the inverter begins pulling power from the array.

name: InverterMinStartVoltage
description: The start voltage of an inverter is the minimum voltage at which the inverter begins pulling power from the array.

name: InverterMonitor
description: Description of the monitoring system for the inverter.

name: InverterNightTareLoss
description: Amount of tare power lost at night. Tare losses are a measure of the energy the inverter consumes to power its internal electronics and magnetics.

name: InverterNightTareLossAt40DegC
description: Amount of tare power lost at night at 40 degrees celsius. Tare losses are a measure of the energy the inverter consumes to power its internal electronics and magnetics.

name: InverterNighttimePowerConsumption
description: The amount of power consumed during the night.

name: InverterNumOfLineConnections
description: Number of inverter line connections.

name: InverterOTRMax
description: Maximum operating temperature of the solar module. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: InverterOTRMin
description: Minimum operating temperature of the solar module. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: InverterOutputACFreqRangeMax
description: Maximum value of the range within which the frequency of the inverter allows the AC to fluctuate, in herz.

name: InverterOutputACFreqRangeMin
description: Minimum value of the range within which the frequency of the inverter allows the AC to fluctuate, in herz.

name: InverterOutputContPower
description: Amount of power that can be delivered continuously by the inverter.

name: InverterOutputMaxApparentPowerAC
description: Maximum, nameplate (nominal) apparent power output of the inverter, in volts-ampere.

name: InverterOutputMaxCurrentAC
description: Maximum amount of current that an inverter will output, AC.

name: InverterOutputMaxPowerAC
description: Maximum, nameplate (nominal) output of the inverter, measured in real power (watts) which is the amount of power actually consumed or utilized in an AC Circuit. It is also called True power or Active Power.

name: InverterOutputPhaseType
description: Phase type of the inverter which can be Single Phase, Three Phase WYE configuration, or Three Phase Delta configuration.

name: InverterOutputRatedFreq
description: Rated frequency of the inverter in Hertz.

name: InverterOutputRatedPowerAC
description: Rated apparent power of the inverter per manufacturers specification in AC.

name: InverterOutputRatedVoltageAC
description: Rated AC voltage of the inverter.

name: InverterOutputVoltageRangeACMax
description: Maximum value of the voltage range of the inverter, per manufacturer specification.

name: InverterOutputVoltageRangeACMin
description: Minimum value of the voltage range of the inverter, per manufacturer specification.

name: InverterPF
description: Power factor of the inverter operating at nominal power. Power factor is the ratio of real power to apparent power.

name: InverterPFMinOverexcited
description: Minimum power factor when injecting reactive power.

name: InverterPFMinUnderexcited
description: Minimum power factor when absorbing reactive power.

name: InverterReversePolarityFlag
description: If the Inverter has reverse polarity, TRUE; if the inverter does not have reverse polarity, FALSE.

name: InverterStaticMPPTEffic
description: Static MPPT efficiency, which quantifies the array power captured under stable conditions.

name: InverterStyle
description: Description of the style of the inverter which can be Central, String, MicroInverter, Distributed, Transformerless, or Grounded.

name: InverterTestingReqrmntsAbstract
description: Information about testing requirements for inverter cut sheets.

name: InverterTransformerDesign
description: Description of the transformer design for the inverter.

name: InverterUL1741SACertDate
description: Date when the inverter UL1741 Supplement A Certification was received.

name: InverterWidth
description: Width of the Inverter.

name: InverterWt
description: Weight of the Inverter.

name: InverterisPartofACPVModule
description: Indicates if the inverter is part of an ACPV Module. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: IrradDiffuseHorizontal
description: The amount of diffuse radiation received per unit area on a horizontal surface. Diffuse irradiance arrives at the surface of measurement from any direction other than the direction of the sun. Diffuse horizontal irradiance is measured in watts per square meter.

name: IrradDirectNormal
description: The amount of direct irradiance received per unit area on a surface that is perpendicular (or normal) to the direction of the sun. Direct irradiance, also termed beam irradiance, is not scattered or reflected by the atmosphere, clouds, or other surfaces before arriving at the surface of measurement. Direct normal irradiance is measured in watts per square meter.

name: IrradForPowerTargetCapMeas
description: Irradiance used for the targeted conditions for the capacity measurement using IEC 61724-2.

name: IrradGlobalHorizontal

name: LeaseAmtPayable
description: Amount payable, which is the sum of basic rent and interest payable on section 467 balance from lessee to lessor.

name: LeaseBankIDForLessee
description: Bank identification number for the lessee.

name: LeaseBaseStipulatedLossValue
description: Base stipulated loss value, which is the gross amount that the investor needs to be paid to be made whole, if there is an early termination of the lease, e.g., the equipment is destroyed.

name: LeaseBasicRent
description: Basic rent which is the amount of rent payable on a specified date, e.g., the amount that must be paid to lessor by lessee.

name: LeaseCntrparty
description: Name of the counterparty to the lease.

name: LeaseCntrpartyAddr
description: Address of the counterparty

name: LeaseCntrpartyJurisdiction
description: Jurisdiction of the counterparty, for example, name of the state.

name: LeaseCntrpartyType
description: Description of the type of counterparty. For example, trust.

name: LeaseDateOfExecution
description: Date of execution of the lease contract. May be the same as the commencement date of the lease.

name: LeaseFederalTaxIDForLessee
description: Federal tax identification number for the lessee.

name: LeaseInterestAccrued
description: Interest, which is the amount of interest that has accrued on the prepaid rent.

name: LeaseInterestPayable
description: Interest payable, which is the amount of interest that must be paid in that period.

name: LeaseInterestPayableOnSection467
description: Interest payable on section 467, which is the interest that has accrued on the section 467 loan balance; for each period how much interest accrued on the balance during that period which will be an amount owed by lessor to lessee.

name: LeaseJurisdictionAndGoverningLaw
description: Description of jurisdiction and governing law that pertains to the lease.

name: LeaseOneYearAvgRent
description: Average annual amount of rent over the lifetime of the lease.

name: LeaseProRataRent
description: Pro rata rent, which is the difference between rent payable and rent accrued during the previous rental period that is not included otherwise in section 467 balance or in base stipulated loss value.

name: LeaseProjCostToLessor
description: Amount paid by the lessor which is probably the bank, to purchase the project.

name: LeaseProjDoc
description: Description of all major project documents related to the lease.

name: LeaseProportionalRent
description: Proportional rent, which is rent accrued for tax purposes. It is a calculated value to show how much rent accrues during the period.

name: LeaseRentPmt
description: Rent payment.

name: LeaseSection467Balance
description: Section 467 balance, which is the cumulative difference between the amount of rent that has been paid and the amount of rent that has been accrued for tax purposes since the inception of the lease. Represents an amount that, if negative, is the amount the lessor owes to lessee; if positive, represents an amount owed by lessee to lessor.

name: LeaseSection467LessorBalance
description: Section 467 lessor balance, which is the sum of basic rent plus interest plus interest payable on section 467 loan balance (if positive, owed from lessor to lessee).

name: LeaseSixMonAvgRent
description: Average amount of rent over any 6 month time period during the lifetime of the lease.

name: LeaseStipulatedLossValue
description: Stipulated loss value, which is the net amount starting with the base stipulated loss value minus section 467 balance plus the pro rata rent.

name: MaxPctThresholdForPmtOfGuarantee
description: Maximum percent loss at which a refund will be paid which effectively puts a cap on the amount of refund. For example, if a guarantee specifies that a refund will be made when output falls between 95-98%, and the output falls to 97%, the refunded amount will be based on 97%. If the loss falls to 94%, the loss will be based on the maximum allowable amount at 95%. 95% is the maximum threshold for payment. Other penalities may apply if the loss falls below the threshold.

name: MbrpCertOfLesseeAvailOfFinalDoc

name: MbrpCertOfLesseeExpDate

name: MbrpCertOfLesseeLink

name: MbrpCertOfMasterLesseeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Membership Certificate of Master Lessee is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: MbrpCertOfMasterLesseeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Membership Certificate of Master Lessee or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: MbrpCertOfMasterLesseeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Membership Certificate of Master Lessee is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: MbrpCertOfMasterLesseeLink
