name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement document.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement or issues raised.

name: MbrpInterestPurchAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Membership Interest Purchase Agreement.

name: MeasCapAtTargetConditions
description: Power measured at the targeted measurement conditions per IEC 61724-2 in kW.

name: MeasClass
description: Measurement class per IEC 71724 where Class A is highest and Class C is lowest.

name: MeasEnergy
description: Energy measured at the revenue meter for the indicated time period according to IEC 61724-3 Section 6.7.

name: MeasEnergyAvailBalanceOfSystemIssues
description: Measured energy availability for the indicated time period due to issues with Balance of Plant (BOP) components calculated as the ratio of the total energy that could have been produced minus the energy lost due to BOP issues divided by the total energy that could have been produced.

name: MeasEnergyAvailDifference
description: A PV system or part of a system is considered to be available when it’s status is observed to be functional. Per IECRE 61724-3, this measure can be calculated as simple difference, percent difference, or ratio calculation. This concept should be reported as a Difference, calculated as Measured - Expected.

name: MeasEnergyAvailPct
description: Measured energy availability for the indicated time period calculated from the measured weather data and observed availability which can be obtained by dividing Expected Energy At Revenue Meter by Expected Energy At Unavailable Times. For solar, use IEC 61724-3, Section 6.8.

name: MeasEnergyAvailSingleTurbine
description: Measured energy availability for the indicated time period due to issues with the single wind turbine indicated calculated as the ratio of the total energy that could have been produced minus the energy lost due to turbine issues divided by the total energy that could have been produced.

name: MeasEnergyAvailableExcludExtOrOtherOutages
description: Actual energy available excluding times of external or other outage causes per IEC 61724-3 Section 6.8.1.

name: MeasEnergyAvgForPeriod
description: Computed average energy production for the period defined on the PeriodAxis over all years of operation since activation date in kWh. To record the average energy for Q1 for example this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis. If the period axis is not used this represents the energy over all years of operation since Activation Date (in kWh).

name: MeasEnergyLossDueToInverterIssues
description: Actual (measured) amount of energy lost due to inverter issues.

name: MeasEnergyLossDueToSoiling
description: Actual (measured) amount of energy lost due to soiling.

name: MeasEnergyToWeatherAdj
description: Ratio of measured energy to measured energy adjusted for weather.

name: MeasEnergyWeatherAdj
description: Energy generated over reporting period adjusted for the difference between measured weather conditions, e.g., irradiance and temperature, and expected weather conditions for the same period during the Typical Meteorological Year or the equivalent used to predict P50 energy generation and the expected degradation rate.

name: MeasEnergyWeatherAdjAvgForPeriod
description: Computed average energy generated for the period, adjusted for the difference between measured weather conditions, e.g., irradiance and temperature, and expected weather conditions for the same period during the Typical Meteorological Year or the equivalent used to predict P50 energy generation and the expected degradation rate. The period is defined on the PeriodAxis over all years of operation since activation date in kWh. To record the average energy for Q1 for example this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis. If the period axis is not used this represents the energy over all years of operation since Activation Date (in kWh).

name: MeasInsolation
description: Actual measured insolation generated in kWh per square meter for a specific duration of time. This is used to measure the insolation from one date to another date. This differs from the element SystemPerformanceMeasuredInsolationAverage which is used to measure system performance from activation date to the current date and can be reported by dividing by periods such as months and quarters or years.

name: MeasInsolationAvg
description: Computed average insolation, for the period defined on the PeriodAxis over all years of operation since activation date in kWh/square meter. To record the average insolation for Q1 for example this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis. If the period axis is not used this represents the insolation over the entire life of the project from activation date up to the contextual date.

name: MeasInsolationToWeatherAdj
description: Actual measured insolation divided by weather adjusted insolation.

name: MeasInsolationToWeatherAdjInceptToDate
description: Actual measured insolation divided by weather adjusted insolation inception to date.

name: MeasScope
description: Scope of the power measurement. Can be "System" for the entire PV system, "Inverter XXX" for a specific inveter, "String YYY" for a specific string.

name: MeasUncertaintyBasisDesc
description: Description of standard method used to calculate uncertainity of measurement

name: MechComplCertAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Mechanical Completion Certificate is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: MechComplCertAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Mechanical Completion Certificate. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: MechComplCertAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Mechanical Completion Certificate is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: MechComplCertCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Mechanical Completion Certificate.

name: MechComplCertDocLink
description: Link to the Mechanical Completion Certificate document.

name: MechComplCertEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Mechanical Completion Certificate.

name: MechComplCertExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Mechanical Completion Certificate.

name: MerchPowerSalesPct
description: Merchant power plants are commercial, independent plants competing to sell energy. This value should represent the percent of merchant power sales.

name: MetStationDesc
description: Description of the meteorological station.

name: MetStationDescOfPyranometer
description: Description of the Pyranometer to measure solar radiation flux density.

name: MetStationLoc
description: Description of the location of the met station.

name: MetStationModelOfPyranometer
description: Model number of Pyranometer to measure solar radiation flux density.

name: MetStationNumOfUnits
description: Number of meteorogical stations.

name: MeterBidirectional
description: Indication as to whether the meter is bidirectional. If it is bidirectional, TRUE; if not bidirectional, FALSE.

name: MeterDisplayType
description: Description of the meter display type, for example, LCD, digital, cyclometer.

name: MeterMeetsPBIEligibility
description: Indicates if the meter meets Performance Based Incentive Program eligibility with certificate documenting accuracy to less than 2%. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: MeterRevenueGrade
description: Indication as to whether the meter is revenue grade. If it is revenue grade, TRUE; if not revenue grade, FALSE.

name: MeterRtgAccuracy
description: Uncertainty of the energy measurement (stated as +/- percent).

name: MicroinvAttachedAdhesive
description: Indication if the microinverter is attached to the module backsheet with adhesive. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: MinOutputGuaranteedPct
description: Minimum percent of P50 expected energy production output guaranteed such that if output falls below that level, a refund will be made. For example, if output is guaranteed to be 98% or higher, the minimum threshhold is 98%. If output falls below 98%, a refund will be made.

name: MismatchModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to module array mismatch, for a typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: MismatchModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to module array mismatch, for a typical meteorogical year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: Model
description: Model number and name of the product.

name: ModelACSystemLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to AC system efficiency based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelAmbTemp
description: Ambient temperature of the site on a given date based on major design/energy production model used. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: ModelAvailLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to downtime of system and/or major components based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelAvgAmbTemp
description: Average Ambient temperature of the site over a given time period based on major design/energy production model used. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: ModelClippingLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to clipping at a maximum AC capacity (inverter or system clipping) based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelFactorsExtCurtailFlag
description: Indication if external curtailment is considered in the design model. If it is considered in the design model, TRUE; if it is not considered in the design model, FALSE.

name: ModelFactorsNonUnityPFFlag
description: Indication if non unity power factor is considered in the design model. If it is considered in the design model, TRUE; if it is not considered in the design model, FALSE.

name: ModelFactorsParasiticLossFlag
description: Indication if parasitic loss is considered in the design model. If it is considered in the design model, TRUE; if it is not considered in the design model, FALSE.

name: ModelFactorsSnowFlag
description: Indication if snow is considered in the design model. If it is considered in the design model, TRUE; if it is not considered in the design model, FALSE.

name: ModelFactorsSoilingFlag
description: Indication if soiling is considered in the design model. If it is considered in the design model, TRUE; if it is not considered in the design model, FALSE.

name: ModelFirstYearModuleDegradLoss
description: Expected annual DC capacity degradation on the module-level in the first year based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelFirstYearProjDegradLoss
description: Expected annual AC capacity degradation on the project-level in the first year based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelHorizonShadingLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to horizon shading based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelImperfectInverterMPPT
description: Expected annualized loss due to inverter maximum power point tracking performance based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelIncidentAngleModifierLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to irradiance incident angle on modules based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelInverterLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to inverter efficiency based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelLowIrradLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to low irradiance based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelModuleOrientationLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to module orientation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelModuleQualityLoss
description: Expected annualized loss due to real module capacity based on flash test results or assumed difference from nameplate capacity based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelOngoingModuleDegradLossFactorModel
description: Expected annualized DC capacity degradation on the module-level after the first year based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelOngoingProjDegradLoss
description: Expected annualized AC capacity degradation on the project-level after the first year based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelParasiticLoad
description: Energy consumed by the project, kWh per time period based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelRefCellTemp
description: Temperature of reference cell used for the model. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: ModelReferenceCelIIrrad
description: Irradiance of the reference cell (light sensor) used in the model.

name: ModelRelativeHumidity
description: Relative humidity percent used for the model, which measures the current absolute humidity relative to the maximum for that temperature.

name: ModelTempLossFactorModel
description: Expected annualized loss due to module temperature based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ModelWeatherSource
description: Weather source used for the model which can be None, Local, Satellite, Modeled, or Mixed.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Module Accelerated Age Test Report is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Module Accelerated Age Test Report. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Module Accelerated Age Test Report is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Module Accelerated Age Test Report.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Module Accelerated Age Test Report.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Module Accelerated Age Test Report.

name: ModuleAccelAgeTestRptDocLink
description: Link to the Module Accelerated Age Test Report document.

name: ModuleApertureArea
description: Aperture area of the module, measured by the long side of the module multiplied by the short of the module, measured in square meters. Also called A_c.

name: ModuleAvailOfStringLevelData
description: Availability of string level data, which refers to a feed of energy coming from a single panel. If string level data is available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

name: ModuleAvgPanelEffic
description: Manufacturers average percent efficiency rating by which the module can convert sunlight to power at Standard Test Conditions (STC). For example, 20% efficiency rating indicates that 80% of the sunlight that goes into the module is lost.

name: ModuleBackMaterial
description: Description of the material used on the back cover of the module.

name: ModuleBuiltInDCOptimizerAvail
description: Indicates if the module has a built-in DC Optimizer, if it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleBypassDiodeOptNum
description: Optimal number of bypass diodes for system integration. Bypass diodes are used to eliminate the hot-spot phenomena which can damage PV cells and even cause fire if the light hitting the surface of the PV cells in a module is not uniform.

name: ModuleCellArea
description: Area of the cells on the module.

name: ModuleCellColumnCount
description: Number of columns of cells on a module.

name: ModuleCellCount
description: Number of cells on a module.

name: ModuleCellRowCount
description: Number of rows of cells on a module.

name: ModuleCertListing
description: Description of certifications available for the module.

name: ModuleDepth
description: Depth of the Module

name: ModuleDesignFactor
description: Multiplier indicating the amount that the module can operate at above the nameplate capacity. For example at factor of 1.1, can safely operate 10% above the stated nameplate capacity rating.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the module factory audit report  is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the module factory audit report. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the module factory audit report  is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the module factory audit report.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptDocLink
description: Link to the Module Factory Audit Report document.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptEffectDate
description: Effective date of the module factory audit report.

name: ModuleFactoryAuditRptExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the module factory audit report.

name: ModuleFireRtg
description: Description of the fire rating as classified by IEC 61730.

name: ModuleFlashTestCap
description: Measured capacity of the individual module, also known as the flash test capacity.

name: ModuleFrameMaterial
description: Description of the material used to build the frame or rating as classified by IP 67/IP 68.

name: ModuleFrontMaterialDesc
description: Description of the material used on the front cover of the module.

name: ModuleHasCertIEC60364-4-41
description: Module has Certification IEC60364-4-41, protection against electric shock. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleHasCertIEC61215
description: Module has Certification IEC61215/EN61215 IEC61215 Ed. 2, aging of PV modules. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleHasCertIEC61646
description: Module has Certification IEC61646, Thin-Film PV modules. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleHasCertIEC61701
description: Module has Certification IEC61701, salt mist corrosion resistance testing on PV modules. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleHasCertIEC61730
description: Module has Certification IEC61730/EN61730, safety qualifications. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleHasCertIEC62108
description: Module has Certification IEC62108, concentrator PV modules. If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleHasCertOther
description: Module has certification other than IEC60364-4-41, IEC61215, IEC61646, IEC61701, IEC61730, or IEC62108. If it does then list the certifications comma delimited.

name: ModuleHasCertUL1703
description: Module has certification UL1703, fire rating.  If it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleIsBIPV
description: Indicates if the module is Building Integrated PV, which means that photovoltaic materials are used to replace conventional building materials in parts of the building envelope such as the roof, skylights, or facades.

name: ModuleJunctionBoxRtg
description: Description of the module Junction Box rating as classified in IP 67.

name: ModuleLen
description: Length of the module.

name: ModuleLevelPowerElectrHasMonitor
description: Indication that the MLPE (module level power electronics) allows monitoring at the module level.

name: ModuleLevelPowerElectrHasOpt
description: Indication that the MLPE (module level power electronics) has a device that will dynamically optimize the voltage-current combination of a string to maximize power.

name: ModuleLevelPowerElectrHasRapidShutDown
description: Indication that the MLPE (module level power electronics) has a device that provides module level rapid shutdown as a safety feature defined in NEC 2017.

name: ModuleLevelPowerElectrHasStringLen
description: Indication that the MLPE (module level power electronics) allows a larger string length.

name: ModuleMaterialsAndWorkmanShipWarrInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Materials and Workmanship Warranty.

name: ModuleMaxSeriesFuseRtg
description: Maximum series fuse rating: rated capacity in amps of the largest fuse that can be used to support module strings.

name: ModuleMaxVoltagePerIEC
description: Maximum amount of voltage that can be safely handled by the module, determined by IEC (International Electrotechnical Commission).

name: ModuleMaxVoltagePerUL
description: Maximum amount of voltage that can be safely handled by the module, determined by UL.

name: ModuleMicroInverterAvail
description: Indicates if the module has a microinverter, if it does, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ModuleNOCT
description: Average nominal operating cell temperature.

name: ModuleNameplateCap
description: Nameplate capacity (nominal power) of the module  estimate set by the manufacturer for all modules of that type. Measured in Watts.

name: ModuleOpTempMax
description: Maximum operating temperature of the solar module. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: ModuleOpTempMin
description: Minimum operating temperature of the solar module. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: ModuleOpenCircuitVoltage
description: The amount of DC voltage the cell, module or string will generate with no load (zero current being delivered).

name: ModuleOrientation
description: Orientation of the module which can be portrait or landscape.

name: ModulePerfWarrEndDate
description: Date performance warranty expires. The performance warranty guarantees that a solar panel will operate with a given level of efficiency over its lifetime.

name: ModulePerfWarrGuaranteedOutput
description: Description of the amount of production guaranteed by a solar panel performance warranty, which will guarantee a percentage of production depending on the age of the module. For example, guarantees 80% production after 25 years.

name: ModulePerfWarrType
description: Description of the type of module performance warranty. For example, duration of the warranty, guaranteed output.

name: ModulePowerToleranceRangeMax
description: Maximum percent tolerance between nameplate (nominal) power and flash test capacity of the module, on average.

name: ModulePowerToleranceRangeMin
description: Minimum percent tolerance between nameplate (nominal) power and flash test capacity of the module, on average.

name: ModuleRatedCurrent
description: Value of the current when module is operating at maximum power. May also be called Maximum Power Current.

name: ModuleRatedCurrentAtLowIrrad
description: Value of the current when module is operating at maximum power and at low irradiance. May also be called Maximum Power Current, or IPmax, low.

name: ModuleRatedCurrentAtNOCT
description: Value of the current when module is operating at maximum power and at NOCT (nominal operating cell temperature). May also be called Maximum Power Current or IPmax, NOCT.

name: ModuleRatedVoltage
description: Value of the voltage when module is operating at maximum power.  May also be called Maximum Power Voltage.

name: ModuleRatedVoltageAtLowIrrad
description: Value of the voltage when module is operating at maximum power and at low irradiance.  May also be called Maximum Power Voltage, or VPmax, low.

name: ModuleRatedVoltageAtNOCT
description: Value of the voltage when module is operating at maximum power and at NOCT (nominal operating cell temperature).  May also be called Maximum Power Voltage or VPmax, NOCT.

name: ModuleSeriesNumOfCells
description: Number of cells in a solar module series.

name: ModuleShortCircuitCurrent
description: Amount of current going through the cell, module or string when the voltage is zero.

name: ModuleTechnology
description: Type of technology used in the module which can be Mono-C-Si (single crystal crystalline silicon technology), Multi-C-Si (uses many crystals crystalline technology), or Thin Film (made by placing one or more films of PV material on a substrate).

name: ModuleTemp
description: Temperature of the PV module at a point in time. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: ModuleTempCoeffMaxCurrent
description: Amount of decrease in maximum current as temperature increases, measured in percent per Celsius. May also be known as αIpmax.

name: ModuleTempCoeffMaxPower
description: Amount of decrease in power output as temperature increases, measured in percent per Celsius. May also be known as γPmax.

name: ModuleTempCoeffOpVoltageAmt
description: Amount of decrease in voltage output as temperature increases, measured in percent per Celsius. May also be known as βVoc.

name: ModuleTempCoeffShortCircuitCurrentAmt
description: Amount of decrease in current output as temperature increases, measured in percent per Celsius. May also be known as αIsc.

name: ModuleTestingExpense
description: Cost of module testing.

name: ModuleWidth
description: Width of the module.

name: ModuleWt
description: Weight of the module.

name: ModulesPerString
description: Number of modules that comprise a single string within the sub array, a single unit of modules mounted together and set at the same angle and orientation.

name: MonitorContractAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Monitoring Contract is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: MonitorContractAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Monitoring Contract. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: MonitorContractAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Monitoring Contract is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: MonitorContractCntrparty
description: Counterparty to the Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance.

name: MonitorContractDocLink
description: Link to the Monitoring Contract document.

name: MonitorContractExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Monitoring Contract.

name: MonitorContractExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance.

name: MonitorContractInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance.

name: MonitorContractRate
description: Rate in currency per kWh of the Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance.

name: MonitorContractRateEscalator
description: Percent escalator in the Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance.

name: MonitorContractRateType
description: Description of the Monitoring Contract rate type defined in the Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance.

name: MonitorContractTerm
description: Term of the  Monitoring Contract between the project company and engineering company to monitor system performance. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnY or PnM. For example, a 5 year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3 month term as P3M.

name: MonitorSolutionSWVersion
description: Version number of application software of the monitoring solution.

name: MonitoringContractCounterparties
description: Names of counterparties to the Monitoring Contract.

name: MountingType
description: Mounting type of the array which can be Ballasted, Attached, BIPV, or Pole/Pier.

name: MultipleListeeLetterSignedByNRTL
description: Indication if the multiple listee letter for the inverter was signed by an NRTL. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: NaturResrcID
description: Identifier for the natural resource.

name: NaturResrcIdentified
description: Description of the natural resource identified.

name: NaturResrcIdentifiedLoc
description: Description of the location of the natural resource.

name: NaturResrcIdentifiedName
description: Name of the natural resource item identified.

name: NaturResrcPermitAction
description: Identifier, name, or title of action required by the natural resources permit.

name: NaturResrcPermitActionDesc
description: Description of action required by the natural resources permit, for example, a fee or covenant.

name: NaturResrcPermitGoverningAuth
description: Name of the governing authority that issued the permit.

name: NaturResrcPermitID
description: Identifier for the natural resource permit.

name: NaturResrcPermitIssueDate
description: Date on which the natural resource permit was issued.

name: NaturResrcPermitLink
description: Link to the permit for the natural resource.

name: NaturResrcStudyAction
description: Description of action suggested in the natural resource study.

name: NetworkType
description: Type of internet connection to system.

name: NightTareLossInWtEfficForm
description: Indication if the night tare loss data was provided in the Weighted Inverter Efficiency Form. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: NonUnityPowerModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to operating at non-unity power factor (note: unity power factor should equal 1.0; operating at 0.9 or 1.1 would result in loss of energy or not enough energy produced.), for a typical meteorological met month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: NonUnityPowerModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to operating at non-unity power factor (note: unity power factor should equal 1.0; operating at 0.9 or 1.1 would result in loss of energy or not enough energy produced.), for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: NoticeAndPmtInstrAvailOfDoc

description: Measured efficiency under test conditions equal to California Energy Commission (CEC) test conditions.

name: OrientationAzimuth
description: Azimuth of the sun, measured in degrees. The horizontal angle measured clockwise from true north, e.g. True North = 0 degrees, East = 90 degrees, South = 180 degrees, etc.

name: OrientationGCR
description: The ground coverage ratio must be a value greater than 0.01 and less than 0.99.

name: OrientationMaxTrackerRotationLimit
description: Maximum (positive) angle of rotation from the vertical plane (at zero degrees) clockwise about the horizontal axis when observed from the equator for north south oriented single axis trackers or from the easterly direction for dual axis trackers or east west oriented single axis trackers.

name: OrientationMinTrackerRotationLimit
description: Minimum (negative) angle of rotation from the vertical plane (at zero degrees) clockwise about the axis when observed from the equator for north south oriented single axis trackers or from the easterly direction for dual axis trackers or east west oriented single axis trackers.

name: OrientationTilt
description: The array's tilt angle in degrees from horizontal, where zero degrees is horizontal, and 90 degrees is vertical and facing the equator (in both the southern and northern hemispheres)

name: OtherAdminFeesPerWatt
description: Other administrative fees. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsDocLink
description: Link to the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports document.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports.

name: OtherEquipDueDiligenceReportsExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Other Equipment Due Diligence Reports.

name: OtherExpensesPerWatt
description: Amount of expense classified as other. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: OtherIncomePerWatt
description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: OtherPermitsGoverningAuthName
description: Name of the governing authority that issued permit

name: OtherPermitsIssueDate
description: Date on which permit was issued

name: OtherPermitsLink
description: Link to permit

name: OtherPermitsType
description: Description of the type of other permit related to the site, for example, Electrical, Building, Wetlands.

name: OtherPmtToFinanciers
description: Amount of other payments made to financiers.

name: OtherPmtToFinanciersPerWatt
description: Amount of payments to other financiers in the reporting period. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: OtherTaxExpenseBenefitPerWatt
description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit). Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: OtherTestingSourceRequirementDocUsedDesc
description: Description of source document requirements used for other testing.

name: PBIRevenue
description: Performance Based Incentive (PBI) Revenue from the State of California. Is a rebate program based on the performance of the system.

name: PBIRevenuePerWatt
description: Revenue from energy production based incentive. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: PPAContractAdditionalTermDuration
description: Duration of additional terms allowed in the Power Purchase Agreement, beyond the initial term. For example, the PPA may allow two additional terms of five years each. The value, five years, should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PPAContractAdditionalTermNum
description: The number of additional terms allowed in the Power Purchase Agreement, beyond the initial term. For example, the PPA may allow two additional terms of five years each. The value two should be entered as an integer.

name: PPAContractReviewConsidered
description: Indicates if a review of the PPA contract has been considered. If it has been considered, TRUE; if it has not been considered, FALSE.

name: PPAContractTermsAssignProvisions
description: Description of assignment provisions in the event that one of the transacting parties to the Power Purchase Agreement wants to assign their rights to someone else.

name: PPAContractTermsBuyoutOptInPPA
description: Description of buyout options in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsCommercOpDateGuaranty
description: Commercial operations date guaranteed which is the date by which the project has to be operational per the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsContractHistoryAndStruct
description: Description of contract history and structure of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsCurtailProvisions
description: Description of curtailment provisions of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsDateOfContractExp
description: Date of contract expiration of long-term contract to purchase electricity from a production system, e.g., could be same as  PPA Expiration Date.

name: PPAContractTermsDateOfContractInitiation
description: Date of contract initiation of long-term contract to purchase electricity from a production system. (Asset mgmt and transaction/trade), e.g., could be the same as PPA Effective Date.

name: PPAContractTermsDefaultProvisions
description: Description of default provisions of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsEndofTermProvisions
description: Description of end of term provisions of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsFinAssurances
description: PowerPurchaseAgreementContractTermsFinancialAssurances

name: PPAContractTermsInsurReqrmnts
description: Description of insurance requirements in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsLimitationofLiability
description: Description of Limitation of Liability clause in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsOrigTermOfPPALease
description: Term of the original Power Purchase Agreement, calculated by Last Payment Date minus First Payment Date. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAAmendmentEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Power Purchase Agreement Amendment.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAAmendmentExecutionDate
description: Execution date of the Power Purchase Agreement Amendment.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAAmendmentExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Power Purchase Agreement Amendment.

name: PPAContractTermsPPACntrparty
description: Counterparty to the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAFirmVolume
description: Guaranteed volume of energy to be delivered by the Project Company under the terms of the Power Purchase Agreement in kWh.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAGuaranteedOutput
description: Output guaranteed in the Power Purchase Agreement in kWh.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPerfGuarantee
description: Performance guarantee output as percent of P50 energy production.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPerfGuaranteeExpDate
description: Power Purchase Agreement Performance Guarantee Expiration Date

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPerfGuaranteeInitiationDate
description: Power Purchase Agreement Performance Guarantee Initiation Date

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPerfGuaranteeTerm
description: Term of the performance guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPerfGuaranteeType
description: Description of the type of performance guarantee.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPortionOfSite
description: Percentage of site based on units per the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsPPAPortionOfUnits
description: Number of units used to measure power system capacity for Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsPPATerm
description: Term of the Power Purchase Agreement. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PPAContractTermsPmtFreq
description: The time interval at which lease payments are to be made to the system owner, for example, monthly, quarterly, annually.

name: PPAContractTermsPowerOfftakeAgreeType
description: Description of Power Offtake Agreement in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsProdGuarantee
description: Amount of energy (kWh) guaranteed to be generated by the installation in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsProvider
description: Name of project company or developer (organization that produces energy) in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsRECBundledWithElectricity
description: Amount of Renewable Energy Credits sold to off-taker when electricity sold to off taker includes the Renewable Energy Credits so the off taker can take advantage of the credit.

name: PPAContractTermsSiteLeaseAgree
description: Confirmation of the availability of the Site Lease Agreement per the Power Purchase Agreement Agreement. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

name: PPAContractTermsSpecialCustomerRightsAndOblig
description: Description of special customer rights and obligations in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsSpecialFeat
description: Description of special features in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsSpecialProviderRightsAndOblig
description: Description of special provider rights and obligations in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsTermRights
description: Description of termination rights of all parties to the transaction in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAContractTermsTransAndSchedResponsibilities
description: Description of transmission and scheduling responsibilities in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPADesc
description: Description of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPAPurchrOptToPurch
description: Description of purchaser option to purchase the system, as described in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPARateActualAmt
description: Power Purchase Agreement Actual revenue generated.

name: PPARateAddrForInvoices
description: Address for Power Purchase Agreement off taker.

name: PPARateAmtActualToIncept
description: Power Purchase Agreement Actual revenue generated from inception to date.

name: PPARateCntrpartyRptReqrmnts
description: Description of Power Purchase Agreement counterparty reporting requirements.

name: PPARateCntrpartyTaxObligAmt
description: Amount of counterparty tax obligations in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPARateCntrpartyTaxObligDesc
description: Description of counterparty tax obligations in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPARateCoInvoicesSentTo
description: Name of company where the Power Purchase Agreement invoice is sent.

name: PPARateContactAddrToRecvNotices
description: Address where notices regarding activities related to the Power Purchase Agreement are sent.

name: PPARateContactEmailToRecvNotices
description: Email address for contact individual for Power Purchase Agreement notices.

name: PPARateContactToRecvNotices
description: Contact individual for Power Purchase Agreement notices.

name: PPARateContractExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPARateEmailAddrToSendInvoices
description: Email address for billing contact for Power Purchase Agreement off taker.

name: PPARateEscalator
description: Percent escalator of the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPARateExpectAmt
description: Power Purchase Agreement expected revenue generated.

name: PPARateExpectAmtInceptToDate
description: Power Purchase Agreement expected revenue generated from inception to date.

name: PPARateHostTelephoneToRecvNotices
description: Telephone number of individual who receives Power Purchase Agreement notices.

name: PPARateInvoicingDate
description: Date of the Power Purchase Agreement invoice.

name: PPARateNameOfContactToSendInvoices
description: Billing contact for Power Purchase Agreement off taker.

name: PPARateNameOfHostToRecvNotices
description: Name of the host company which should receive Power Purchase Agreement notices regarding activities related to the PPA. The host company is the entity with control of the site for the distributed generation system.

name: PPARatePhoneOfInvoicesContact
description: Telephone number for billing contact at Power Purchase Agreement off taker.

name: PPARatePmtDeadline
description: Deadline date for Power Purchase Agreement payment.

name: PPARatePmtMeth
description: Description of payment terms for Power Purchase Agreement payments.

name: PPARateProdCap
description: Amount of the production cap in the Power Purchase Agreement in kWh.

name: PPARateProdGuarantee
description: Amount of energy (kWh) guaranteed to be generated by the installation in the Power Purchase Agreement.

name: PPARateProdGuaranteeTiming
description: The period during which the guaranteed production of the system in kWhs is calculated. For example, the amount is guaranteed over a period of a month or year.

name: PPARateRemainingTermofPPALease
description: Estimated time left remaining in the Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) or lease based on how much output has been generated so far compared to the original guaranteed output in the PPA or lease. Calculated as Last Payment Date minus Cut-off Date. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PPARateSeasoningNumOfPmtMade
description: Total number of payments made to date in the Power Purchase Agreement or lease.

name: PPARateSystemTrueUpProd
description: True up equals the difference between the amount of kWh originally estimated and the actual output.

name: PPARateTimeOfUseFlag
description: Used to indicate if an hourly rate schedule is used. If hourly rate schedule is used, TRUE; if hourly rate schedule is not used, FALSE.

name: PPARateTotalUpfrontPmt
description: Total amount paid toward the system cost by customer at the start of installation.

name: PPARateTrueupTiming
description: The frequency at which the true up occurs. For example, the true up occurs once per year, once per month.

name: PPARateType
description: Description of rate type for Power Purchase Agreement, e.g. $/kWh.

name: PTOInterconnApprovAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval document is available. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: PTOInterconnApprovAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: PTOInterconnApprovAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: PTOInterconnApprovCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval.

name: PTOInterconnApprovDocLink
description: Link to the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval document.

name: PTOInterconnApprovEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval.

name: PTOInterconnApprovExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval or issues raised.

name: PTOInterconnApprovExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Permission To Operate Interconnection Approval.

name: PVArrayEnergyOneYearYield
description: The PV array energy yield YA is the array energy output (DC) per rated kW(DC) of installed PV array: YA = EA / P0. Calculated  for a one year period.

name: PVSystemID
description: Identifier for the System (plant).

name: PVSystemOneYearYield
description: The final PV system yield Yf is the net energy output of the entire PV system (AC) per rated kW (DC) of installed PV array: Yf = Eout / P0.Calculated  for a one year period.

name: PVSystemPerfSamplingInterval
description: Rate at which performance data is collected, for example, seconds.

name: ParallelMonitorCntrparty
description: Name of parallel monitoring provider (activated at start of project, continue working throughout the project) per the Continuity of Operations Agreement which is the plan for the installation going forward including contingencies which may be triggered by financial performance.

name: ParallelMonitorContractExpDate
description: Expiration date of the parallel monitoring contract.

name: ParallelMonitorContractInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of parallel monitoring contract per the Continuity of Operations Agreement which is the plan for the installation going forward including contingencies which may be triggered by financial performance.

name: ParallelMonitorContractTerm
description: Term of the parallel monitoring contract in years per the Continuity of Operations Agreement which is the plan for the installation going forward including contingencies which may be triggered by financial performance. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: ParallelMonitorOngoingMonFee
description: Ongoing Monthly Fees for Parallel Monitoring Contract per the Continuity of Operations Agreement which is the plan for the installation going forward including contingencies which may be triggered by financial performance.

name: ParallelMonitorUpfrontMobilizationFee
description: Upfront mobilization Fee for Parallel Monitoring Contract per the Continuity of Operations Agreement which is the plan for the installation going forward including contingencies which may be triggered by financial performance.

name: ParasiticLossMeasInTest
description: Indication as to whether parasitic losses are measured in the test. If they are included, TRUE; if they are not included, FALSE.

name: ParasiticLossModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to annualized Parasitic Energy loss (inverters, trackers, etc.) for a typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ParasiticLossModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to annualized Parasitic Energy loss (inverters, trackers, etc.) for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ParentCoChildCoType
description: Type of child company which can be counterparty or Special Purpose Vehicle.

name: ParentCoStakeInChildCoPct
description: Percentage stake of the parent company in the child company.

name: ParentCoType
description: Type of parent company which can be counterparty or Special Purpose Vehicle.

name: ParentGuaranteeBeneficiary
description: Name of the beneficiary of the Parent guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: ParentGuaranteeDesc
description: Description of parent guarantee.

name: ParentGuaranteeDocLink
description: Link to the Parent Guarantee document.

name: ParentGuaranteeDuration
description: Duration of the Parent guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: ParentGuaranteeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the parent guarantee.

name: ParentGuaranteeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the parent guarantee.

name: ParentGuaranteeGuarantor
description: Name of the guarantor in the Parent Guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: ParentGuaranteeLimits
description: Goals of the guarantee in the Parent guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: ParentGuaranteeMinLiquidity
description: Minimum amount of cash on hand allowable by the investor in the Parent guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: ParentGuaranteeOblig
description: Description of reporting obligations in the Parent guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: ParentGuaranteeObligors
description: Name of the obligor in the Parent guarantee, which is provided by the parent of the developer to the project company in the event project revenue goals are not met.

name: PartnershipFlipCntrparty
description: Name of the counterparty to the Partnership Flip.

name: PartnershipFlipCntrpartyAddr
description: Address of the counterparty to the partnership flip.

name: PartnershipFlipCntrpartyJurisdiction
description: Description of the type of counterparty in the partnership flip. For example, trust.

name: PartnershipFlipCntrpartyType
description: Jurisdiction of the counterparty in the partnership flip, for example, name of the state.

name: PartnershipFlipDate
description: Date on which the investor's target return has been reached, also called the flip point.

name: PartnershipFlipExecutionDate
description: Date of execution of the Partnership Flip contract. May be the same as the commencement date of the Partnership Flip.

name: PartnershipFlipExpDate
description: Date on which the Partnership Flip or group of Partnership Flips is set to expire, in CCYY-MM-DD format.

name: PartnershipFlipP50FlipDate
description: Date of the partnership flip when the annual energy output is a P50 yield.

name: PartnershipFlipP50FlipPeriod
description: Expected flip period for the partnership based on getting the average amount of expected output. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PartnershipFlipP75FlipDate
description: Date of the partnership flip when the annual energy output is a P75 yield.

name: PartnershipFlipP75FlipPeriod
description: Expected flip period for the partnership based on a P75 yield. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PartnershipFlipP90FlipDate
description: Date of the partnership flip when the annual energy output is a P90 yield.

name: PartnershipFlipP90FlipPeriod
description: Expected flip period for the partnership based on a P90 yield. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PartnershipFlipP95FlipDate
description: Date of the partnership flip when the annual energy output is a P95 yield.

name: PartnershipFlipP95FlipPeriod
description: Expected flip period for the partnership based on a P95 yield. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PartnershipFlipP99FlipDate
description: Date of the partnership flip when the annual energy output is a P99 yield.

name: PartnershipFlipP99FlipPeriod
description: Expected flip period for the partnership based on a P99 yield. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PartnershipFlipTermOfContract
description: Contract term of the partnership flip. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PartnershipFlipYield
description: Required target return of the investor, at which point the partnership allocation would flip.

name: PerfGuaranteeDesc
description: Description of the Performance guarantee, which is provided by the operator or developer to guarantee a certain level of operating performance.

name: PerfGuaranteeDocLink
description: Link to the Performance Guarantee document.

name: PerfGuaranteeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Performance guarantee, which is provided by the operator or developer to guarantee a certain level of operating performance.

name: PerfGuaranteeExclusions
description: Description of exclusions in the Performance guarantee, which is provided by the operator or developer to guarantee a certain level of operating performance.

name: PerfGuaranteeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Performance guarantee, which is provided by the operator or developer to guarantee a certain level of operating performance.

name: PerfGuaranteeLiquidatedDamages
description: Amount of liquidated damages in the Performance guarantee, which is provided by the operator or developer to guarantee a certain level of operating performance.

name: PerfGuaranteeProvider
description: Name of operator or developer providing the Performance guarantee, which is provided to guarantee a certain level of operating performance.

name: PerfGuaranteeTerm
description: Term of the Performance guarantee, which is provided by the operator or developer to guarantee a certain level of operating performance. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: PerfModelModifiedFlag
description: Indication as to whether the performance model has been modified relative to the previous test completed. If it has been modified, TRUE; if it has not been modified, FALSE.

name: PerfRatioMethodology
description: Description of the methodology used to calculate the performance ratio which could be IECRE or another method.

name: PerfRatioNonWeatherCorrected
description: Performance ratio, non-weather corrected, percent, calculated per IEC 61724-3.

name: PerfRatioWeatherCorrected
description: Performance ratio, weather corrected, percent, calculated per IEC 61724-3.

name: PeriodOfApplicableDistribution
description: Period for which the cash distribution is made, for example the month of January, or the 2nd quarter.

name: PeriodicBudgetEndDate
description: End date for the time period

name: PeriodicBudgetNumberforthePeriod
description: Number of the time period, for example 1 may represent the first quarter of the year.

name: PeriodicBudgetOutputEnergy
description: Gross energy output in the period, in megawatt hours, pre availability and curtailment.

name: PeriodicBudgetStateDate
description: Start date for the time period

name: PeriodicBudgetSystemAvailPct
description: Plant availability in percent.

name: PermittingAndLicensesExpense
description: Cost of permits and licenses needed for the solar installation.

name: PhaseOfProjNeeded
description: Phase of the project which can be pre-construction, early construction, periodic throughout construction, upon initial funding (Mechanical Completion) or upon final funding (Substantial or Final Completion).

name: PledgeAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Pledge Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: PledgeAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Pledge Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: PledgeAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Pledge Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: PledgeAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Pledge Agreement.

name: PledgeAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Pledge Agreement document.

name: PledgeAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Pledge Agreement.

name: PledgeAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Pledge Agreement or issues raised.

name: PledgeAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Pledge Agreement.

name: PledgeAgreeLink
description: Link to the Pledge Agreement document.

name: PmtForRentPerWatt
description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: PmtServicingACHPmt
description: Indicates whether ACH payment capability has been set up; if it has, TRUE; if it has not, FALSE.

name: PmtServicingACHPmtDiscountAmt
description: Amount of ACH payment discount.

name: PmtServicingACHPmtDiscountPct
description: Amount of ACH payment discount as a percentage.

name: PmtServicingACHPmtPenalty
description: Amount of ACH payment penalty.

name: PmtServicingAnnualEscalatorforLeasePmt
description: Annual escalator percent increase compounded per year, calculated at project in-service date or date first monthly payment is due.

name: PmtServicingBaseLeasePmt
description: Amount of the base lease payment, initial payment prior to escalation.

name: PmtServicingFirstPmtDate
description: First payment date of the system.

name: PmtServicingInsurPmtRecv
description: Amount of the insurance payment received.

name: PmtServicingLastPmtDate

name: PortfolioNumOfSystems

name: PowerAC
description: Power (AC) measured at an instant in time

name: PowerDC
description: Power (DC) measured at an instant in time

name: PowerPerfIndex
description: Ratio of measured to targeted power per IEC 61724-2, section 6.4.

name: PowerRtgInWtEfficForm
description: Indication if the Power Rating (continuous at unity power factor) was provided in the weighted efficiency form. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: PowerTargetCapMeas
description: Power expected for capacity measurement when executing IEC 61742-2 for the specified target conditions.

name: PrecipitationType
description: Type of precipitation according to SYNOP codes

name: PredictedAllInOneYearYield
description: Predicted total (all-in) yield for a one year period.

name: PredictedEnergyAtTheRevenueMeter
description: Predicted active electrical production at the revenue meter for each year, based on historical weather data that is representative for the site, per IEC 61724-3. Calculated as Total Predicted Energy reflecting times of unavailability and parasitic loss. This element is defined as the sum of electrical production over a period of time, for example from the 1st day to the last day of the month, and has a period type of duration. This should not be used with the Period [Axis].

name: PredictedEnergyAtTheRevenueMeterForPeriod
description: Predicted active electrical production at the revenue meter for each year, based on historical weather data that is representative for the site, per IEC 61724-3. Calculated as Total Predicted Energy reflecting times of unavailability and parasitic loss. This element can be used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period such as year and has a period type of instant to measure a point in time. If no Period [Axis] is used, the time period for the value is from the date of the value in the instance document to the end of the life of the system.

name: PredictedEnergyAvailEstRatio
description: Predicted Energy Availability Estimate by Year, which is the modelled predicted energy for unity availability. The ratio is calculated by dividing PredictedEnergyAtTheRevenueMeterInstant by PredictedEnergyAvailable. This element can be used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period such as year and has a period type of instant to measure a point in time.

name: PredictedEnergyAvailable
description: Predicted energy available is calculated as predicted energy (at unity availability which means that energy is available all the time) multiplied by predicted availability equals predicted energy (at predicted availability). For example, if 10,000 MWh is predicted for unity availability and we predict availability of 0.99, then predicted energy is 9,900 MWh. 10,000=9,900/0.99. This element should be used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period such as year.
