description: Comment made during Residual Value Review

name: ProjCounty
description: County where the installation is located.

name: ProjDateOfLastResidualValueReview
description: Date of most recent Residual Value Review.

name: ProjDesc
description: Information describing the project.

name: ProjDevelopmentStrategy
description: Description of the project development strategy, for example, greenfield, brownfield, acquisition.

name: ProjDistributedGenerationPortfolioOrUtilityScale
description: Indicates whether the project is distributed generation or utility scale.

name: ProjEarlyBuyOutAmt
description: Amount of the buy-out at the end of the lease.

name: ProjEarlyBuyoutDate
description: In the event of an early buyout, earliest date at which the buyout can occur; can have multiple projects so this would be associated with a project

name: ProjEarlyBuyoutOpt
description: Description of early buy out options.

name: ProjFederalTaxIncentiveType
description: Description of federal tax incentive.

name: ProjFinCurtailAbilityAndCap
description: Description of curtailment ability and cap.

name: ProjFinFundDate
description: Date of the funding of the project.

name: ProjFinLessee
description: Name of project company lessee.

name: ProjFinOtherMaterialOngoingOblig
description: Description of other material ongoing obligations.

name: ProjFinPPATimeOfUse
description: Indicates whether Power Purchase Agreement rate is based on time of delivery, a time specified during the day. If PPA is based on time of delivery, TRUE; if PPA is not based on time of delivery, FALSE.

name: ProjFinProjFinNum
description: Bank-specific number associated with the project schedule.

name: ProjFinReportsAndNotifications
description: Description of reports and notifications.

name: ProjFinSideLetters
description: Description of side letters.

name: ProjFinStruct
description: Description of financing structure, for example, sales leaseback, partnership flip.

name: ProjFinTaxIDNum
description: Project company tax ID number.

name: ProjFinWorkingCapitalAcctPrefundAmt
description: Prefunded amount set aside by project company for working capital account in the fund.

name: ProjFinWorkingCapitalAcctReqdAmt
description: Required amount of the fund set aside by project company for working capital account.

name: ProjFinWorkingCapitalAcctReqdMon
description: Required number of months of funds on hand set aside by project company for working capital account.

name: ProjFullyContractedPowerSales
description: Power Purchase Agreement is greater than or equal to the lease term in a sale leaseback. If the term greater, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ProjFundLatestCOD
description: Latest Commercial Operations Date (COD) of a project in a fund.

name: ProjHedgeAgreeType
description: Type of hedge agreement in place for the project which can be Swap, Revenue Put, CfD (Contracts for Difference), None or Other.

name: ProjID
description: Identifier for the project.

name: ProjIndemnifiedAmt
description: Amount of indemnification.

name: ProjInitialFundYear
description: Amount of funding in first year of the project.

name: ProjInterconnType
description: Indicates the nature of interconnection which can be behind the meter, virtual net meter or in front of the meter.

name: ProjInvestStatus
description: Indicates the investment status of the project which can be awarded, committed, partially funded, or fully funded.

name: ProjLevered
description: Indication as to whether project has leveraged debt. If it does have leveraged debt, TRUE; if it does not, FALSE.

name: ProjName
description: Name assigned to the project.

name: ProjProdBasedIncentiveFlag
description: Indicates if the project has a production based incentive (PBI). If it has a PBI, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ProjPropertyInsurEarthquakeRequirement
description: Description of Earthquake Requirement in Property Insurance

name: ProjPropertyInsurFloodRequirement
description: Description of Flood Requirement in Property Insurance

name: ProjRECOfftakeAgree
description: Indicates if the project has renewable energy credit offtake agreement. If it has a REC agreement, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ProjRECertFlag
description: Indicates if the project has renewable energy certificates. If it does, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ProjRebateFlag
description: Indicates if the project has a rebate. If it has a rebate, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ProjRecentEventAboutTheProj
description: Noteable event that happened within the last year.

name: ProjRecentEventSeverityOfEvent
description: Level of severity of the recent project event, which can be Low, Moderate, or High.

name: ProjResidualValueAssump
description: Remaining value of the project after the lease term or project ends.

name: ProjRoofOblig
description: Description of obligations related to the roof.

name: ProjStage
description: Indicates the status of the project which can be under development, in construction or in operation.

name: ProjState
description: State or region where the project is located.

name: ProjStateTaxCreditFlag
description: Indicates if the project is entitled to a state tax credit. If it is entitled, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: ProjTaxEquityProviderContrib
description: Amount of contribution of tax equity provider.

name: ProjWindStatus
description: Describes the status of the wind project, for example whether it is new, or repowering.

name: PropertyPlantAndEquipSalvageValuePerWatt
description: The estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose). Value should be reported as amount per watt, and should be used with the IECREPredictedVersusActualAxis.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Property Tax Exemption Opinion is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Property Tax Exemption Opinion is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinDocLink
description: Link to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion document.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Property Tax Exemption Opinion.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion or issues raised.

name: PropertyTaxExemptionOpinExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Property Tax Exemption Opinion.

name: PunchListAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Punch List is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: PunchListCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Punch List.

name: PunchListCostOfOutstngItems
description: Cost of outstanding items on the Punch List.

name: PunchListDesc
description: Description of the Punch List.

name: PunchListDocLink
description: Link to the Punch List document.

name: PunchListEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Punch List.

name: PunchListExpectComplDate
description: Expected completion date of the Punch List.

name: PurchDate
description: Purchase date of the device.

name: QualFacilSelfCertAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: QualFacilSelfCertAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: QualFacilSelfCertAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: QualFacilSelfCertCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification.

name: QualFacilSelfCertDocLink
description: Link to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification document.

name: QualFacilSelfCertEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification.

name: QualFacilSelfCertExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification or issues raised.

name: QualFacilSelfCertExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification.

name: RECActualAmt
description: Actual amount of renewable energy credit.

name: RECActualAmtInceptToDate
description: Actual amount of renewable energy credit from inception to date.

name: RECActualToExpectRevenue
description: Actual renewable energy credit revenue divided by expected renewable energy credit revenue.

name: RECActualToExpectRevenueInceptToDate
description: Actual renewable energy credit revenue divided by expected renewable energy credit from inception to date.

name: RECBuyerAckAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: RECBuyerAckAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: RECBuyerAckAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: RECBuyerAckCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement.

name: RECBuyerAckDocLink
description: Link to the REC Buyer Acknowledgement document.

name: RECBuyerAckEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement.

name: RECBuyerAckExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement or issues raised.

name: RECBuyerAckExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement.

name: RECContractAmendmentExecutionDate
description: Execution date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract Amendment which is the amendment to the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractExecutionDate
description: Execution date of the Renewable Energy Credit contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractFirmPrice
description: Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractFirmVolume
description: Value of the Renewable Energy Credit associated with the guaranteed firm volume in MWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractGuaranteedOutput
description: Total guaranteed output associated with the guaranteed firm volume in kWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECContractPortionOfSite
description: Renewable energy credit percentage of site based on units defined as REC portion units (the portion of the units on a site which are eligible for the REC).

name: RECContractPortionOfUnits
description: Description of units used to measure power system capacity for Renewable Energy Credit in power units.

name: RECContractRateEscalator
description: Percent increase escalation per year of the renewable energy credit price.

name: RECContractRateType
description: Description of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract rate type.

name: RECContractStruct
description: Description of the structure of the Renewable Energy Credit contract.

name: RECContractTerm
description: Term of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract Performance Guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: RECContractVolumeCap
description: Maximum amount of renewable energy that can be sold over a specified time period in MWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract, which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECEnvAttributesOwn
description: Name of the environmental attributes owner, per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECExpectAmt
description: Expected amount of renewable energy credit.

name: RECExpectAmtInceptToDate
description: Expected amount of renewable energy credit from inception to date.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement document.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement or issues raised.

name: RECOfftakeAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement.

name: RECPerfGuarantee
description: Performance guarantee as percent of P50 energy production  per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

name: RECPerfGuaranteeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract performance guarantee.

name: RECPerfGuaranteeNumOfCred
description: Number of renewable energy credits guaranteed per the performance agreement.

name: RECPerfGuaranteeTerm
description: Term in years of the Renewable Energy Credit contract performance guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: RECPerfGuaranteeType
description: Description of the Renewable Energy Credit contract performance guarantee.

name: RECPerformaneGuaranteeInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Renewable Energy Credit contract performance guarantee.

name: RECRevenuePerWatt
description: Revenue from renewable energy credits. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: REInspctBodyName
description: Name of the renewable energy inspection body completing the annual test.

name: Rainfall
description: Amount of rainfall in a given period of time

name: RatedPowerPeakAC
description: AC nameplate capacity at revenue meter as built.

name: RatioArrayCapAsMeasToArrayCapAsRatedDC
description: Ratio of array capacity as measured to array capacity as rated in DC.

name: RatioMeasInsolationToP50
description: Actual measured insolation divided by P50 insolation.

name: RatioMeasInsolationToP50InceptToDate
description: Actual measured insolation divided by P50 insolation from inception to date.

name: RatioMeasToExpectEnergyAtTheRevenueMeter
description: Ratio of actual measured energy to expected energy at the revenue meter, per IECRE 61724-3.

name: RatioMeasToExpectEnergyAtTheRevenueMeterInceptToDate
description: Ratio of actual measured energy to expected energy at the revenue meter, per IECRE 61724-3, from inception to date.

name: RealEstateTaxExpensePerWatt
description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land). Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: RebateRevenue
description: Revenue from rebates from federal and state governments.

name: RebateRevenuePerWatt
description: Revenue from renewable energy rebate program. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: RefCellCalibrationConstantAtRptCond
description: Ratio of reference cell current to irradiance at spectrum for reporting condition, termed C_RC in ASTM E2848-11. Units of A/(W/m2).

name: ReferenceOneYearYield
description: The reference yield Yr can be calculated by dividing the total in-plane irradiation by the module's reference plane of array irradiance: Yr = Hi / Gi,ref, where the reference plane of array irradiance Gi,ref (kW⋅m−2) is the irradiance at which P0 is determined. Calculated  for a one year period.

name: RegulAppApprovDate
description: Date on which the Qualified Facility (QF) or Exempt Wholesale Generators (EWG) application was approved.

name: RegulAppLink
description: Link to regulatory application document.

name: RegulAppSubmsnDate
description: Date on which the Qualified Facility (QF) or Exempt Wholesale Generators (EWG) application was submitted.

name: RegulApprovLink
description: Link to regulatory approval notice.

name: RegulApprovStatus
description: Describes status of regulatory approval received which can be Not Submitted, Submitted, Approved, or Declined.

name: RegulCertNum
description: Certificate number for the Qualified Facility (QF) or Exempt Wholesale Generators (EWG).

name: RegulFERC203AppApprovNoticeDate
description: Date on which FERC 203 application was approved.

name: RegulFERC203AppApprovNoticeLink
description: Link to FERC 203 approval notice.

name: RegulFERC203AppLink
description: Link to FERC 203 application document.

name: RegulFERC203AppSubmsnDate
description: Date on which FERC 203 application was submitted.

name: RegulFERC203Flag
description: Indicates if the project must file a MBR (market based rate) application under FERC 203. If the project must file an application, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: RegulFERC203Status
description: Describes status of regulatory approval received for FERC 203 which can be Not Submitted, Submitted, Approved, or Declined.

name: RegulFERC205AppApprovNoticeDate
description: Date on which FERC 205 application was approved.

name: RegulFERC205AppApprovNoticeLink
description: Link to FERC 205 approval notice.

name: RegulFERC205AppLink
description: Link to FERC 205 application document.

name: RegulFERC205AppSubmsnDate
description: Date on which FERC 205 application was submitted.

name: RegulFERC205Flag
description: Indicates if the project must file a MBR (market based rate) application under FERC 205. If the project must file an application, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: RegulFERC205Status
description: Describes status of regulatory approval received for FERC 205 which can be Not Submitted, Submitted, Approved, or Declined.

name: RegulFERCType
description: Description of the type of FERC regulation that applies to the power plant based on its capacity.

name: RegulFacilityType
description: Describes type of regulatory facility, which can be QF (Qualified Facility), EWG (Exempt Wholesale Generators), or Not Applicable.

name: RegulPUCApprov
description: Confirmation of receipt of Public Utilities Commission (PUC) approval. If approved, TRUE; if not approved, FALSE.

name: RegulPowerMkt
description: Region where power is sold, for example California CAISO, MISO, New England, New York, Northwest, PJM, Southeast, Southwest, SPP, Texas which are markets named at ferc.gov.

name: RegulSpecialFeat
description: Description of special features related to regulation.

name: ReportableEnvCond
description: Description of the Reportable Environmental Condition.

name: ReportableEnvCondAction
description: Description of any action that will be taken to remedy issues with the Reportable Environmental Condition.

name: ReserveAcctNum
description: Bank account number for the reserve.

name: ReserveAcctReqdDate
description: Date on which the reserve account is required to be established.

name: ReserveCollateralType
description: Type of reserve collateral which could be cash or letter of credit.

name: ReserveFormOfCurrentReserve
description: Form of current reserve, either Letter of Credit or cash.

name: ReserveFundAccumulationOnSched
description: Indication that reserve fund has accumulated per schedule. If it is on schedule, TRUE; if it is not on schedule, FALSE.

name: ReserveLOCProviderCreditRtg
description: Credit rating of provider of letter of credit, either Moody's or Standard and Poors.

name: ReservePreFundedAmt
description: Prefunded amount available in the reserve at the start of the project or fund.

name: ReservePreFundedAmtReqd
description: Amount required to be prefunded in the reserve for the project or fund.

name: ReservePreFundedNumOfMon
description: Number of prefunded months available in the reserve at the start of the project or fund.

name: ReservePreFundedNumOfMonReqd
description: Number of prefunded months required to have available in the reserve for the project or fund.

name: ReserveReserveHasBeenUsed
description: Indication that reserve has been used. If it has been used, TRUE; if it has not been used, FALSE.

name: ReserveTargetAmt
description: Target amount of reserve.

name: ReserveUse
description: Description of how the reserve funds will be used which can be for rent, maintenance or other activities.

name: RevenueGrade
description: True if power meter is revenue grade quality.

name: RevenueMeterDimensionsHeight
description: Height of the revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterDimensionsLen
description: Length of the revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterDimensionsWidth
description: Width of the revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterEnclosure
description: Description of the enclosure for the revenue meter, for example NEMA 3 R type.

name: RevenueMeterFreq
description: Frequency of the revenue meter per manufacturer specification.

name: RevenueMeterKilovoltAmpereReactiveData
description: Indication as to whether revenue meter kVar data has been collected. If data has been collected, TRUE; if data has not been collected, FALSE.

name: RevenueMeterMaxRtgContCurrent
description: Rated continuous AC current of the revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterMaxRtgContVoltageLineToLine
description: AC voltage of the line to line revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterMaxRtgContVoltageLineToNeutral
description: AC voltage of the line to neutral revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterOpTemp
description: Operational temperature of the revenue meter. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: RevenueMeterOpTempRangeMax
description: Maximum operating temperature of the revenue meter. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: RevenueMeterOpTempRangeMin
description: Minimum operating temperature of the revenue meter. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: RevenueMeterPF
description: Measure of the power factor of the power system.

name: RevenueMeterPhase
description: Description of the phases of the revenue meter, for example, 240 VAC single phase, per manufacturer specification.

name: RevenueMeterPhaseData
description: Indication as to whether phase data has been collected. If data has been collected, TRUE; if data has not been collected, FALSE.

name: RevenueMeterRtgContVoltage
description: AC voltage of the revenue meter.

name: RevenueMeterSocketType
description: Socket type of the revenue meter, per manufacturer specification.

name: RevenueMeterStartingWatts
description: Description of the amount of watts needed to start the revenue meter, for example less 5 Watts, per manufacturer specification.

name: RevenueMeterTypicalWattLoss
description: Typical amount of watts lost through the revenue meter, per manufacturer specification.

name: RevenueMeterVoltageRtgAccuracyRange
description: Accuracy range of the revenue meter voltage, for example +/- 20%.

name: RevenueMeterWt
description: Weight of the revenue meter.

name: RevenuesPerWatt
description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss). Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: RiskPriorityNum
description: Risk Priority Number which is a numeric indicator of the health of the plant.

name: RoofSlopeType
description: Type of roof slope which can be flat, sloped or steep.

name: RoofType
description: Type of roof which can be Thermoplastic Polyolefin, Ethylene Propylene Diene Terpolymer, Polyvinyl Chloride, Built Up Bituminous, SBS, Asphalt Shingle, Wood Shingle, Composite Shingle, Slate, Metal Roof, Tile Clay, Tile Concrete.

name: SCADACommProtocol
description: Communication protocol of the SCADA System which can be Modbus, Zigbee, WIFI, or Ethernet.

name: SCADADocLink
description: Link to the documentation URI for the SCADA System.

name: SCADAIPAddr
description: Data Acquisition) system.

name: SCADALicenseExpDate
description: Data Acquisition) system license.

name: SCADALicenseExpense
description: Data Acquisition) license.

name: SCADAMfrContactAndTitle
description: Data Acquisition) system.

name: SCADAMfrEmailAddr
description: Data Acquisition) system.

name: SCADAMfrName
description: Data Acquisition) systems manufacturer.

name: SCADAModel
description: Data Acquisition) system.

name: SCADANumOfUnits
description: Data Acquisition) systems in a portfolio.

name: SWIFTCode
description: Swift code for the bank. The Swift code is a standard format of Bank Identifier Codes (BIC) in accordance with ISO 9362.

name: SaleLeasebackCntrparty
description: Name of the counterparty to the sale leaseback.

name: SaleLeasebackCntrpartyAddr
description: Address of the counterparty to the sale leaseback.

name: SaleLeasebackCntrpartyJurisdiction
description: Description of the type of counterparty in the sale leaseback. For example, trust.

name: SaleLeasebackCntrpartyType
description: Jurisdiction of the counterparty in the sale leaseback, for example, name of the state.

name: SaleLeasebackExecutionDate
description: Date of execution of the sale leaseback contract. May be the same as the commencement date of the sale leaseback.

name: SaleLeasebackExpDate
description: Date which sale leaseback or group of sale leasebacks is set to expire, in CCYY-MM-DD format.

name: SaleLeasebackTermOfContract
description: Contract term of the sale leaseback. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: SchedAndForecastingExpense
description: Expense for scheduling and forecasting service for most utility scale projects.

name: SecurityAddr
description: Address for security guard company.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Security Agreement Supplement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Security Agreement Supplement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Security Agreement Supplement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Security Agreement Supplement.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplDocLink
description: Link to the Security Agreement Supplement document.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Security Agreement Supplement.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Security Agreement Supplement or issues raised.

name: SecurityAgreeSuplExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Security Agreement Supplement.

name: SecurityCo
description: Name of the company providing security.

name: SecurityEmailAndPhone
description: Email and phone number of the company providing security.

name: SecurityEquipMaintExpense
description: Cost of maintaining the security equipment.

name: SecurityGuardExpense
description: Cost of the security guard.

name: SecurityInterestInAssetMgmtAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Asset Management Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInEPCAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInEquityCapitalContribAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Equity Capital Contribution Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInHedgeAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Hedge Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInIndivContractorAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Individual Contractor Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInLLCAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Limited Liability Company Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInLeaseSched
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Lease Schedule. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInMasterLeaseAgree
description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Master Lease Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

name: SecurityInterestInMbrpInterestPurchAgree

description: Indicates if interest is recorded for security interests. If it is recorded, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

description: Status of Security Interest which can be Not Due, Over Due, Granted, Expired.

name: SecurityInterestsType
description: Type of Security Interest, which can be Mortgage, Deed of Trust, Lien, Pledge, Collateral Assignment.

name: SecurityLocalCoExpenseForResponse

name: SecuritySWUpgradeExpense
description: Cost of security software upgrade.

name: SecurityTransExpense
description: Transportation expense for the security company.

name: SerialNum
description: Serial number of the device.

name: SeriesResistanceModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to Ohmic losses (both AC and DC), for a typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: SeriesResistanceModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to Ohmic losses (both AC and DC), for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ShadingModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to shading, for a typical meteorogical month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: ShadingModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to shading, for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Shared Facility Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Shared Facility Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Shared Facility Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Shared Facility Agreement.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Shared Facility Agreement document.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Shared Facility Agreement.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Shared Facility Agreement or issues raised.

name: SharedFacilityAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Shared Facility Agreement.

name: SiteAcreage
description: Number of acres in the site.

name: SiteAddr1
description: First line of the address of the site.

name: SiteAddr2
description: Second line of the address of the site.

name: SiteAddrCity
description: City where site is located.

name: SiteAddrCountry
description: ISO country code where the site is located.

name: SiteAddrState
description: State or province where the system is based.

name: SiteAddrZipCode
description: Zip (postal) Code where the site is based.

name: SiteBarometricPressure
description: Barometric pressure at the site.

name: SiteClimateClassificationIECRE
description: Description of the climate classification of the site per IECRE 60721. For example: Tropical, Arid, Temperate, Cold, Polar.

name: SiteClimateClassificationKoppen
description: Indicates the climate zone for the site using Koppen Climate Classifications of 2.1 Tropical/megathermal climates, 2.1.1 Tropical rainforest climate, 2.1.2 Tropical monsoon climate, 2.1.3 Tropical wet and dry or savanna climates, 2.2 Dry (desert and semi-arid) climates, 2.3 Temperate/mesothermal climates, 2.3.1 Mediterranean climates, 2.3.2 Humid subtropical climates, 2.3.3 Oceanic climates, 2.3.4 Highland climates, 2.4 Continental/microthermal climates, 2.4.1 Hot summer continental climates, 2.4.2 Warm summer continental or hemiboreal climates, 2.4.3 Subarctic or boreal climates, 2.5 Polar climates.

name: SiteClimateZoneTypeANSI
description: Climate Criteria.

name: SiteCollectionSubstationAvail
description: Indication as to whether there is a data collection substation located at the site.

name: SiteCtrlContractStructAndHistory
description: Description of contract structure and history per Site Control.

name: SiteCtrlDesc
description: Description of Site Control.

name: SiteCtrlEffectDate
description: Effective date when developer will have control of the site.

name: SiteCtrlEndofTermProvisions
description: Description of end of term provisions.

name: SiteCtrlHostCo
description: Name of the Site Control Host Company.

name: SiteCtrlLessee
description: Name of lessee of the site where the system is located.

name: SiteCtrlLessor
description: Name of lessor of the site where the system is located.

name: SiteCtrlNumOfSites
description: Number of sites per Site Control.

name: SiteCtrlRent
description: Amount of rent for the site where the system is located.

name: SiteCtrlReqdSiteAccessNotice
description: Description of required site access notice.

name: SiteCtrlSiteAccessAgreeCntrparty
description: Counterparty to the Site Access Agreement.

name: SiteCtrlSiteAccessReqrmnts
description: Description of requirements to access the site.

name: SiteCtrlSiteHostContactNameAndTitle
description: Name and title of the host (owner) of the site.

name: SiteCtrlSiteHostEmailAndPhone
description: Email and phone number of the host (owner) of the site.

name: SiteCtrlSpecialFeat
description: Description of special features of the site.

name: SiteCtrlTerm
description: Term of the site control in years. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: SiteCtrlTitlePolicy
description: Description of the Title Policy of the site.

name: SiteCtrlType
description: Type of control relationship between the developer and the site, which can be Own, Lease, Easement, or Combination.

name: SiteElevationAvg
description: Average altitude of PV system array.

name: SiteEnvCondBirdPopulations
description: Indicates if bird population conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondDieselSoot
description: Indicates if diesel soot conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondDust
description: Indicates if dust conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondHail
description: Indicates if hail conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondHighInsolation
description: Indicates if high insolation conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondHighWind
description: Indicates if high wind conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondIndustrialEmissions
description: Indicates if industrial emission conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondPollen
description: Indicates if pollen conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteEnvCondSaltAir
description: Indicates if salt air conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: SiteGeospatialBoundaryDesc
description: Description of the geospatial boundaries of the site.

name: SiteGeospatialBoundaryFileURI
description: URI of the geospatial boundary information file.

name: SiteGeospatialBoundaryGISFileFormat
description: File type of the geospatial boundary information file which can be GEOJson, Shapefile, KML, or GML.

name: SiteID
description: Universally unique identifier for the site.

name: SiteLatitudeAtRevenueMeter
description: The latitude of the system at the system meter. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

name: SiteLatitudeAtSystemEntrance
description: The latitude of the system at the system entrance. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

name: SiteLeaseAccessAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Site Lease Access Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseAccessAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site Lease Access Agreement. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseAccessAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Site Lease Access Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseAccessAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Site Lease Access Agreement document.

name: SiteLeaseAccessAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Site Lease Access Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeCntrparty
description: Name of the lessor of the site per the Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeInitiationDate
description: Initiation date of the Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeRateEscalator
description: Rate escalator percent of the Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeRateExpense
description: Annual cost of rent for the site per the Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeRateType
description: Description of rate type of Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeTerm
description: Term of the Site Lease Agreement. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: SiteLeaseAgreeType
description: Description of the type of Site Lease Agreement.

name: SiteLeaseAssignAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Site Lease Assignment is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseAssignAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site Lease Assignment or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseAssignAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Site Lease Assignment is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseAssignCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Site Lease Assignment.

name: SiteLeaseAssignDocLink
description: Link to the Site Lease Assignment document.

name: SiteLeaseAssignEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Site Lease Assignment.

name: SiteLeaseAssignExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Site Lease Assignment or issues raised.

name: SiteLeaseAssignExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Site Lease Assignment.

name: SiteLeaseDetails
description: Details about the site lease. For example, could include existence of a land remediation bond.

name: SiteLeaseMemoAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Site Lease Memo is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseMemoAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site Lease Memo or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseMemoAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Site Lease Memo is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SiteLeaseMemoCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Site Lease Memo.

name: SiteLeaseMemoDocLink
description: Link to the Site Lease Memo document.

name: SiteLeaseMemoEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Site Lease Memo.

name: SiteLeaseMemoExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Site Lease Memo or issues raised.

name: SiteLeaseMemoExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Site Lease Memo.

name: SiteLeasePmtPerWatt
description: Site lease expense. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: SiteLicenseAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Site License Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SiteLicenseAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site License Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SiteLicenseAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Site License Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SiteLicenseAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Site License Agreement.
