name: SiteLicenseAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Site License Agreement or issues raised.

name: SiteLicenseAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Site License Agreement.

name: SiteLicenseAgreeLink
description: Link to the Site License Agreement document.

name: SiteLongitudeAtRevenueMeter
description: The longitude of the system at the system meter. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

name: SiteLongitudeAtSystemEntrance
description: The longitude of the system at the system entrance. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

name: SiteMandatoryAccessReqrmnts
description: Description of mandatory requirements for access to the site, such as background checks.

name: SiteName
description: Name of the site.

name: SiteNaturDisasterRisk
description: Description of the potential for natural disasters on or near the site, for example, wildfires, flood, windstorms.

name: SiteParcelID
description: Assessors parcel number, or APN, which is a number assigned to parcels of real property by the tax assessor of a particular jurisdiction for purposes of identification and record-keeping.

name: SitePermitReviewConsidered
description: Indicates if the site permit review has been considered. If it has been considered, TRUE; if it has not been considered, FALSE.

name: SitePropertyAppraisalURI
description: URI location where PDF of site appraisal is stored.

name: SitePropertyConsumablesInventory
description: Description of the location of consumables which are items such as fuses that are used up quickly and must be replenished.

name: SitePropertyGeotechnicalURI
description: URI location where PDF of site geotechnical report is stored.

name: SitePropertyLocOfKeys
description: Description of the location of physical keys to the system.

name: SitePropertyLocOfWaterHookups
description: Description of the location of water hookups at the system.

name: SitePropertyMapsURI
description: URI location where PDF of site maps are stored.

name: SitePropertyOccupancyType
description: The occupancy status of the building upon which the PV system is installed. Can be either Owner Occupied or Rental.

name: SitePropertyOtherExpensesConsumablesExpense
description: Expense to store consumables, which are parts that are expected to be used up and in need of replacement on a regular basis, like fuses.

name: SitePropertyOtherExpensesCostOfRepairs
description: Cost of repairs.

name: SitePropertyOtherExpensesEstSystemRemovalCosts
description: Estimated system removal costs in the event the project is removed, for example, due to permitting or lease agreement.

name: SitePropertyOtherExpensesStorageOfSparePartsExpense
description: Expense to store spare parts.

name: SitePropertyOtherExpensesTechnicianSalaryBenefitsExpense
description: Salary and benefits expense for technicians.

name: SitePropertyOtherExpensesTelecomExpense
description: Telecommunications expense.

name: SitePropertyPhotosURI
description: URI location where PDF of site photos are stored.

name: SitePropertySparePartsInventory
description: Description of the location of spare parts inventory for the system.

name: SitePropertySubType
description: The legal description of the building relative to property type.

name: SitePropertySurveyURI
description: URI location where PDF of site surveys are stored.

name: SiteType
description: Description of the type of site, for example, campus, store, factory.

name: SiteUTCOffset
description: The UTC offset for the site which is the difference in minutes from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) .

name: SizeMegawatts
description: Size of the entity in megawatts.

name: SizeValue
description: Total investment value of the entity.

name: SnowAccumulation
description: Depth of snow on the ground during a given period of time

name: SnowModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to snow based on typical meteorogical month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: SnowModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to snow based on typical meteorogical year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

name: Snowfall
description: Amount of snowfall in a given period of time

name: SoilInSiteRptAvailable
description: Indicates if the report providing details of soil consistency, chemistry, site soil measurements (probing trench, probing drill, etc) has been submitted. If it has been submitted, TRUE; if it has not been submitted, FALSE

name: SoilingInstrumentType
description: Type of soiling instrument.

name: SoilingModelFactorTMMPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to soiling based on typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design model used.

name: SoilingModelFactorTMYPct
description: Percentage of kWh lost due to soiling based on typical meteorogical year, calculation based on major design model used.

name: SoilingRatio
description: Soiling ratio in percent. The soiling ratio is the ratio of irradiance reaching a soiled module's cells, to the irradiance reaching the cells of a clean module.

name: SolarArrayAnnualDegrad
description: Percent capacity of the array lost each year due to degradation.

name: SolarArrayNumOfInvertersConnectedToArray
description: Number of inverters connected to an array.

name: SolarArrayNumOfPanelsInArray
description: Number of solar panels or modules in an array.

name: SourceOfFundsAmt
description: Amount of the contribution made.

name: SourceOfFundsBankFundedFlag
description: Indication as to whether the funding source is a bank entity. If it is a bank, TRUE; if it is not a bank, FALSE.

name: SourceOfFundsCntrpartyID
description: Identifier for the counterparty that is providing the funds.

name: SourceOfFundsDesc
description: Description of the contribution made, for example, Bank contributed 45% of funds for initial funding of XYZ project.

name: SourceOfFundsSPVID
description: Identifier for the SPV that is providing the funds.

name: SourceOfFundsSPVOrCntrparty
description: Indication as to whether the source is an SPV entity or Counterparty.

name: SpecialPurposeVehicleBankInternalCode
description: Bank internal code for the Special Purpose Vehicle.

name: SpecialPurposeVehicleType
description: Description of the type of Special Purpose Vehicle, for example Project Company or Fund Company.

name: SponsorGroupBankInternalRtg
description: Bank internal rating for sponsor

name: SponsorGroupID
description: Identifier for the Sponsor Group.

name: StandardsApplicable
description: Description of the standard or source of publicly available procedure that is applicable to the data needed.

name: StartDateOfElecEnergyTest
description: Time stamp indicating first day of IEC 61724-3 test, administered under OD-402.

name: StartDateOfElecPowerTest
description: Time stamp indicating the first day of the IEC 61724-2 test, administered under OD-401 or OD-402.

name: StatedUncertaintyOfExpectEnergyBasedOnAllFactorsPct
description: Uncertainty in expected energy arising from all factors (including bias and precision) of energy measured, expressed as +/- percent uncertainty.

name: StatedUncertaintyOfExpectEnergyBasedOnWeatherPct
description: Uncertainty in expected energy arising from uncertainty in the measured weather data, expressed as +/- percent uncertainty. For example, 3% uncertain that the expected energy will be xx.

name: SubArrayGeospatialLayoutFileFormat
description: Type of file format used for the GIS File which could be GeoJSON, Shapefile, KML or GML.

name: SubArrayGeospatialLayoutFileLink
description: Link to the SubArray Geospatial Layout (GIS) file.

name: SubArrayID
description: Unique Identifier used to identify the subarray

name: SubstantialComplCertAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Substantial Completion Certificate is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SubstantialComplCertAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Substantial Completion Certificate. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SubstantialComplCertAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Substantial Completion Certificate is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SubstantialComplCertCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Substantial Completion Certificate.

name: SubstantialComplCertDocLink
description: Link to the Substantial Completion Certificate document.

name: SubstantialComplCertEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Substantial Completion Certificate.

name: SubstantialComplCertExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Substantial Completion Certificate.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewDocLink
description: Link to the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review document.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review.

name: SuplRptReviewOfInsurReviewExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Supplemental Report Review Of Insurance Review or issues raised.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewDocLink
description: Link to the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review document.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review.

name: SuplRptReviewOfLocalTaxReviewExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Supplemental Report Review Of Local Tax Review or issues raised.

name: SuppliersContractReviewConsidered
description: Indicates if the suppliers contract review has been considered. If it has been considered, TRUE; if it has not been considered, FALSE.

name: SupplyAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Supply Agreements is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: SupplyAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Supply Agreements or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: SupplyAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Supply Agreements is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: SupplyAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Supply Agreements.

name: SupplyAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the Supply Agreements document.

name: SupplyAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Supply Agreements.

name: SupplyAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Supply Agreements or issues raised.

name: SupplyAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Supply Agreements.

name: SuretyAnnualPremium
description: Annual amount of the surety premium.

name: SuretyBondAmt
description: Value of the surety bond.

name: SuretyBondContractDate
description: Contract date of the surety bond.

name: SuretyBondEffectDate
description: Effective date of the surety bond.

name: SuretyBondFormAndVersionNum
description: Description of the surety bond form used which can include the name of the form and version number. For example, a form provided by the Association of General Contractors or ACORD.

name: SuretyBondIsElectronic
description: Flag indicating if the surety bond is electronic. If it is electronic, TRUE; if it is not electronic, FALSE.

name: SuretyBondNum
description: Surety bond number which is assigned by the surety company and is the surety company's unique identifier.

name: SuretyContractDesc
description: Description of the surety bond contract.

name: SuretyElectronicBondValidationWebSite
description: Validation web site of the surety electronic bond carrier.

name: SuretyElectronicBondVerificationNum
description: Bond Verification Number which comes from the Electronic Bond Provider and is unique to their system.

name: SuretyLegalJurisdiction
description: Jurisdiction for the bond which is usually identified in the contract, to be used to determine where a case would be brought in the event of a dispute.

name: SuretyObligee
description: Name of the obligee (beneficiary) of the surety.

name: SuretyObligeeEmail
description: Email address of the Obligee to the surety bond.

name: SuretyPrincipal
description: The name of the Principal to a surety bond, which is a promise by a surety or guarantor to pay one party (the obligee) a certain amount if a second party (the principal) fails to meet some obligation, such as fulfilling the terms of a contract.

name: SuretyPrincipalEmail
description: Email address of the Principal to the surety bond.

name: SuretyWarrTerm
description: Term of the surety warranty bond. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: SwiftCode
description: Swift code for the bank. The Swift code is a standard format of Bank Identifier Codes (BIC) in accordance with ISO 9362.

name: SystemAvailAchievementReqd
description: Percent availability required to meet the achievement goal, for example 98% plant availability.

name: SystemAvailAchievementReqdPct
description: Description of the system availability achievement requirement, for example, 98% availability over two years.

name: SystemAvailAchievementReqdReconciliationPeriod
description: Reconciliation period during which the system availability must be met.

name: SystemAvailAchievementReqdReconciliationUnits
description: Units, for example, months, years, for the reconciliation period during which the system availability must be met.

name: SystemAvailActualPctUptime
description: Actual percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions for a specified month, availability defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

name: SystemAvailActualPctUptimeInceptToDate
description: Percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions from inception to date, actual, availability defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

name: SystemAvailExpectPctUptime
description: Expected percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions for a specified month, defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

name: SystemAvailExpectPctUptimeInceptToDate
description: Percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions from inception to date, expected, availability defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

name: SystemAvailMeasToMeasEnergyPlusLostEnergy
description: Plant energy production or plant energy metered in the time period divided by the sum of that value and the calculated lost energy in the period (kWh). Energy-Based Availability takes into consideration that an hour in a period with high irradiance is more valuable than in a period with low irradiance.

name: SystemAvailMode
description: Indicates the system availability mode which can be  Islanded, Standby, Environment, Grid, Shutdown, Forced, or Emergency.

name: SystemBatteryConnec
description: Explains how the battery is coupled with the system which can be DC-coupled or AC-coupled.

name: SystemCapPeakDC
description: DC capacity of the system at Standard Test Condition (STC), often referred to as kWp (kilowatt peak).

name: SystemCommercOpDate
description: Date the operations of the entity commenced which is when interconnection is made and electricity starts flowing onto the grid, may also be called Operations Commenced Date.

name: SystemCostInstallCostsMfr
description: Installation Costs paid to the manufacturer, excludes cost of equipment.

name: SystemCostInstallEngAndDesignCost
description: Installation Costs paid to the manufacturer, excludes cost of equipment.

name: SystemCostInstallInterconnFeesCost
description: Interconnection Fees at installation.

name: SystemCostInstallLaborCosts
description: Installation Labor Costs excluding manufactuer costs with a labor component.

name: SystemCostInstallMuniInspectionsCost
description: Costs of Municipal Inspection at installation.

name: SystemCostInstallPermittingFeesCost
description: Permitting Fees at installation.

name: SystemCostInstallUtilityInspectionsCost
description: Costs of utility inspection at installation.

name: SystemCostOtherSystemCost
description: Other costs associated with the system implementation.

name: SystemDERType
description: DER (Distributed Energy Resource) type of the system, which could be PV System Only, Storage Only, PV plus Storage, Wind or PV Charging Station.

name: SystemDateCompletedCommiss
description: Date of commissioning which includes conditional acceptance by owner.

name: SystemDateElecCompl
description: Date when the electrical system is complete including capability to connect to the grid, but it is not yet fully tested and not necessarily connected to grid.

name: SystemDateFinalAccept
description: Date when owner accepts system, usually approximately one year after operation begins.

name: SystemDateFinalCompl
description: Date when owner accepts system as final per EPC Agreement.

name: SystemDateInterconnAvail
description: Date when all of the equipment is in place, so the installation could connect to the grid, (ready to request PTO - permission to operate), but do not yet have permission.

name: SystemDateIssueForProcur
description: Date at which the design is completed and ready to move forward with ordering equipment and starting construction.

name: SystemDateMechCompl
description: Date when all major equipment has been installed, but the project is not yet interconnected to the grid.

name: SystemDatePlacedInServ
description: Date at which the installation obtains Placed in Service (PIS) status.This is used for tax purposes and means the system has met the following: (1) It is synched with the grid, (2) it has no major outstanding permits, (3) it has or is capable of commencing delivery of energy to the grid, (4) care, custody and control has been transferred to the operator, (5) critical tests are complete, for example, those required by the EPC and interconnection agreements.

name: SystemDateSubstantialCompl
description: Date when the power System has been interconnected and is ready to generate power. This is often used for funding purposes.

name: SystemDecommDate
description: Date when the system is decommissioned.

name: SystemDegradRate
description: Actual degradation rate of the system, in percent of kWh lost.

name: SystemDrawing
description: URL link to the drawing of the system.

name: SystemEPCCost
description: Engineering procurement and construction costs of the system.

name: SystemExpectCommercOpDate
description: Date the operations of the entity are expected to commence which is when interconnection is made and electricity starts flowing onto the grid.

name: SystemGridChargingCapability
description: Indication as to whether the system allows for grid charging.

name: SystemInstallerCo
description: Name of the company that has or will install the system.

name: SystemIrradiationWeatherAdjustmentFactor
description: Ratio between expected (assumed) one year in-plane measured irradiation and actual one year in-plane measured irradiation.

name: SystemMethToDetermineAvail
description: Description of the method used to determine system availability which could be defined as in IECRE 61724-3 or some other standard method.

name: SystemMinIrradThreshold
description: Minimum irradiance required to activate a PV system or subarray.

name: SystemMonitorCo
description: Name of the company that monitors the system.

name: SystemName
description: Name of the system.

name: SystemNumOfModules
description: Aggregate number of modules (panels) in a system.

name: SystemOpName
description: Name of company that is responsible for operating the system.

name: SystemOperationStatus
description: Indicates the operational status of the system which can be operational, under maintenance, communication failure, or decommissioned.

name: SystemPF
description: Power factor setting of the power system which is defined as the ratio of the real power flowing to the load, to the apparent power in the circuit. It is a dimensionless number in the closed internal of -1 to +1.

name: SystemPTODate
description: Date at which conditional acceptance and permission from the utility is completed and the project has moved into the operating phase.

name: SystemPerfCombinerBoxTemp
description: Temperature of the combiner box, the mechanism that brings together multiple solar strings. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: SystemPerfDCInputCurrent
description: Amount of DC input in current, measured in amps.

name: SystemPerfDCInputPower
description: Amount of DC input measured in power which is voltage times current.

name: SystemPerfDCInputVoltage
description: Amount of DC input in voltage, measured in volts.

name: SystemPerfGHI
description: Total amount of shortwave radiation received from above by a surface horizontal to the ground at the location of the solar installation, measured in watts per square meter.

name: SystemPerfGridFreq
description: Frequency of the current being exported to the grid in hertz. This is a static amount that the system uses rather than the hertz at a point in time.

name: SystemPermittingDesc
description: Description of project permits required before the project can begin on a single solar installation.

name: SystemPreventiveMaintTasksStatus
description: Indication of the status of preventative maintenance tasks performed for cycle, which can be complete or incomplete.

name: SystemQualityLevelDesc
description: Description of the system quality.

name: SystemSparePartsStatusLevel
description: Indicates if the status of the spare parts level is sufficient or insufficient.

name: SystemStruct
description: Description of the system structure which can be Rooftop, Carport or Ground Mount.

name: SystemType
description: Indicates the system characterization of the site as either Residential, Community Solar, Commercial, Industrial, Agricultural, Utility.

name: SystemUptimeRatio
description: Measure of system availability (uptime), calculated by taking the ratio of total useful time (time during which the plant is operating without taking any exclusion factors into account) minus total downtime, divided by the total useful time, multipled by 100. Total useful time is defined as the time when the plant is exposed to irradiation levels above the generator’s Minimum Irradiance Threshold (MIT). This measure is sourced from Solar Power Europe.

name: TargetBalanceAmt
description: Specifies target balance amount.

name: TargetBalancePeriod
description: Period of time during which the target balance applies.

name: TaxEquityCashDistributions
description: Amount of the tax equity cash distributions.

name: TaxEquityCashDistributionsPerWatt
description: Amount of payment to tax-equity investors in the reporting period. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: TaxEquityCommPlan
description: Description of the developer plan for tax equity reporting and communication including a short description of how the sponsor will interface with the tax equity recipient on consent requests, operating issues, tax return filing, tracking models, operating reports and other issues.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Tax Indemnity Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Tax Indemnity Agreement. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Tax Indemnity Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

name: TaxIndemnityAgreeLink
description: Link to the Tax Indemnity Agreement document.

name: TaxOpinAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Tax Opinion is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: TaxOpinAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Tax Opinion or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: TaxOpinAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Tax Opinion is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: TaxOpinCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Tax Opinion.

name: TaxOpinDocLink
description: Link to the Tax Opinion document.

name: TaxOpinEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Tax Opinion.

name: TaxOpinExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Tax Opinion or issues raised.

name: TaxOpinExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Tax Opinion.

name: TaxPreparationFee
description: Amount of tax preparation fees incurred during the period.

name: TaxPreparationFeePerWatt
description: Fee for preparing tax returns. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: TempAmb
description: Temperature of the air.

name: TempCell
description: Temperature of a cell in a module.

name: TempMeter
description: Temperature of a power measurement device.

name: TempModule
description: Temperature measured at the back of a module.

name: TempRefCell
description: Temperature of a reference cell.

name: TermLoanAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Term Loan is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: TermLoanAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Term Loan or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: TermLoanAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Term Loan is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: TermLoanCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Term Loan.

name: TermLoanDocLink
description: Link to the Term Loan document.

name: TermLoanEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Term Loan.

name: TermLoanExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Term Loan or issues raised.

name: TermLoanExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Term Loan.

name: TermSheetAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Term Sheet is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: TermSheetAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Term Sheet or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: TermSheetAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Term Sheet is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: TermSheetCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Term Sheet.

name: TermSheetDocLink
description: Link to the Term Sheet document.

name: TermSheetEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Term Sheet.

name: TermSheetExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Term Sheet or issues raised.

name: TermSheetExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Term Sheet.

name: TestLabIsNRTL
description: Indicates if the test lab used was a Nationally Recognized Testing Laboratory (NRTL) whose Scope of Recognition under the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) includes UL 1741. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: TestRsltForSecurementHumidityFreezeAndTempCycling
description: Indication if test results were submitted for securement, humidity-freeze, and temperature cycling. If they were, TRUE; if they were not, FALSE.

name: TestWasCalibrated
description: Indicates if the test equipment was calibrated when the test was performed. If it was, TRUE; if it was not, FALSE.

name: ThirdPartyEngagementFee
description: Amount of the total fee for the engagement.

name: ThirdPartyEngagementHiringEntity
description: Description of type of entity who engaged the third party, for example, Sponsor, Fund, Bank.

name: ThirdPartyEngagementQualityofWork
description: Description of the quality of the work delivered.

name: ThirdPartyName
description: Full legal name of a third party.

name: ThirdPartyVendorCode
description: The vendor code in the bank's internal systems.

name: TimeInterval
description: Time interval for a measurement period

name: TitlePolicyAvailable
description: Indication as to whether the site has a title policy available.

name: TitlePolicyExceptDesc
description: Description of the title policy exception.

name: TitlePolicyExclusionDesc
description: Description of the Title Policy Exclusion.

name: TitlePolicyID
description: Identifier for a title policy.

name: TitlePolicyInsurAmt
description: Amount of the title policy.

name: TitlePolicyInsurCo
description: Name of the insurance company for the title insurance.

name: TitlePolicyInsurFinalPolicyLink
description: Link to the final title policy insurance document.

name: TitlePolicyInsurProformaDocLink
description: Link to the pro forma document for the title policy.

name: TitlePolicyInsurStatus
description: Status of the title policy, which may be Not applicable, Not issued, Pro Forma, or Final.

name: TitleRptLink
description: Link to the title report.

name: TitleSurveyAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Title Survey is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: TitleSurveyAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Title Survey or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: TitleSurveyAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Title Survey is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: TitleSurveyCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Title Survey.

name: TitleSurveyDocLink
description: Link to the Title Survey document.

name: TitleSurveyEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Title Survey.

name: TitleSurveyExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Title Survey or issues raised.

name: TitleSurveyExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Title Survey.

name: TotalExpectEnergyAtRevenueMeter
description: Sum of expected energies for both times of availability and unavailability, calculated as Expected Energy At Revenue Meter + Expected Energy At Unavailable Times. This element should be used with the Period Axis to indicate the period.

name: TotalOfAllProjAcctBalancesPerWatt
description: Total of all project account balances at the end of the reporting period. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: TrackerAltitude
description: The height of the tracker from ground-level.

name: TrackerAzimuth
description: Azimuth measure of the tracker.

name: TrackerCapPower
description: Tracker Capacity in kWdc.

name: TrackerIsDualAxis
description: Indicator if the tracker is dual axis; if it is TRUE, if it is not, FALSE.

name: TrackerIsFixedTilt
description: Indicator if the tracker is fixed tilt; if it is TRUE, if it is not, FALSE.

name: TrackerIsSingleAxis
description: Indicator if the tracker is single axis; if it is TRUE, if it is not, FALSE.

name: TrackerMaterialsWorkmanshipWarrExp
description: Workmanship Warranty expiration date.

name: TrackerMaterialsWorkmanshipWarrInitiation
description: Workmanship Warranty initiation date.

name: TrackerNumOfControllers
description: Number of tracker controllers which are electronic devices that directs the tracker.

name: TrackerStowWindSpeed
description: Stow wind speed in meters/second; tracker stow threshold

name: TrackerStyle
description: Indicates whether the system tracker is fixed, horizontal axis, two-axis, vertical, vertical-axis, or seasonal tilt.

name: TrackerTilt
description: The tracker's tilt angle in degrees from horizontal, where zero degrees is horizontal, and 90 degrees is vertical and facing the equator (in both the southern and northern hemispheres).

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Transmission Report and Curtailment Estimate is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Transmission Report and Curtailment Estimate or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Transmission Report and Curtailment Estimate is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Transmission Report and Curtailment Estimate.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstDocLink
description: Link to the Transmission Report And Curtailment Estimate document.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Transmission Report and Curtailment Estimate.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstExceptDesc
description: Description of exceptions to the transmission and curtailment report.

name: TransRptAndCurtailEstExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Transmission Report and Curtailment Estimate.

name: TransformerDesignFactor
description: Multiplier indicating the amount that the module can operate at above the nameplate capacity. For example at factor of 1.1, can safely operate 10% above the stated nameplate capacity rating.

name: TransformerPressure
description: Transformer pressure, in PSI.

name: TransformerStyle
description: Description of the tranformer technology style used such as 2/3/4 winding, Inverter step up transformer.

name: TransformerTemp
description: Transformer temperature. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

name: TypeOfDevice
description: The value of the item defined as a member for equipment for example, ModuleMember, TransformerMember, LoggerMember.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing, a legal form filed to indicate that they have or will have an interest in the property of the debtor. is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing, a legal form filed to indicate that they have or will have an interest in the property of the debtor.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingDocLink
description: Link to the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing document.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingEffectDate
description: Effective date of the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing, a legal form filed to indicate that they have or will have an interest in the property of the debtor.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing or issues raised.

name: UCCPrecautLeaseFilingExpDate
description: Expiration date of the UCC Precautionary Lease Filing, a legal form filed to indicate that they have or will have an interest in the property of the debtor.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the UCC Security Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the UCC Security Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the UCC Security Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the UCC Security Agreement.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeDocLink
description: Link to the UCC Security Agreement document.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeEffectDate
description: Effective date of the UCC Security Agreement.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the UCC Security Agreement or issues raised.

name: UCCSecurityAgreeExpDate
description: Expiration date of the UCC Security Agreement.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches are available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches are available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesEffectDate
description: Effective date of the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches or issues raised.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentLienSearchesExpDate
description: Expiration date of the UCC Tax Lien and Judgment Lien Searches.

name: UCCTaxLienAndJudgmentSearchesDocLink
description: Link to the UCC Tax Lien And Judgment Searches document.

name: UnderwritingAmtOfPrepaidExpenses
description: Amount of prepaid expenses.

name: UnderwritingAvailOfPrepaidExpenses
description: Prepaid expenses are available for the project; if available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

name: UnderwritingCrossCollateralizationStruct
description: Description of cross collateralization structure among funds.

name: UnderwritingLOCPurpose
description: Description of purpose of Letter of Credit

name: UnderwritingOtherUniqueUnderwritingStruct
description: Description of any other features of the underwriting structure.

name: UnderwritingPresentValueOfProj
description: Present Value of the project.

name: UnderwritingProtectionMech
description: Description of protection mechanism.

name: UnderwritingRentCoverageRatio
description: Rent coverage ratio, defined as Earnings Before Income, Tax, Depreciation and Amortization, divided by rent payments.

name: UnderwritingReserveStruct
description: Description of reserve structure.

name: UnderwritingRevenueSources
description: Description of revenue sources.

name: UnderwritingTermValue
description: Termination value of the project.

name: UnderwritingTermValueGap
description: Difference between the actual termination value and the present value of the project value at the time of the termination.

name: UnleveredInternalRateOfRtn
description: Unlevered internal rate of return. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: UpdatedMajorDesignModel
description: Type of design model when the model is changed which could be Pvsyst, SAM, PV Watts, or Other.

name: UseOfFundsAmt
description: Amount of the payment made for the use of the funds.

name: UseOfFundsCntrpartyID
description: Identifier for the counterparty that is using the funds.

name: UseOfFundsDesc
description: Description of the contribution, for example, 45% of funding provided for XYZ project.

name: UseOfFundsEntityType
description: Indication of the type of entity using the funds which could be Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV), Counterparty or Third Party.

name: UseOfFundsProjSpecificFlag
description: Indication as to whether the use of funds is for a specific project. If it is for a specific project, TRUE; if it is not for a specific project, FALSE.

name: UseOfFundsSPVID
description: Identifier for the SPV that is using the funds.

name: UseOfFundsThirdPartyID
description: Identifier for the third party that is using the funds.

name: UtilitiesCostsPerWatt
description: Utilities costs incurred during the reporting period for services, such as water, sewer, gas, electricity and telephone required to operate a building. Value should be reported as amount per watt. The StatementScenarioAxis should be used to report values that are predicted. No axis should be used to report values that are actual.

name: UtilityContactName
description: Contact name for the utility company where the grid connection will reside.

name: UtilityContactTitle
description: Contact title for the utility company where the grid connection will reside.

name: UtilityCostBasedIncentiveAmt
description: Tax Rebate Incentive based on the cost of the system

name: UtilityCostBasedIncentiveAppDate
description: Date Tax Rebate is applied

name: UtilityElectricityCost
description: Electricity cost for the utility company where the grid connection will reside in amount per kWh.

name: UtilityElectricityExpense
description: Amount for the electricity expense for the utility company where the grid connection will reside.

name: UtilityEmailAddr
description: Utility email address.

name: UtilityGrantAmt
description: Reduction in system cost by grant amount

name: UtilityLegalEntityID
description: The Legal Entity Identifier of the utility.

name: UtilityName
description: Name of utility company where the grid connection will reside.

name: UtilityProdBasedIncentiveRate
description: Incentive based on the production of the system, provided by the Utility.

name: UtilityRateName
description: Name of the rate charged by the utility to the offtaker.

name: UtilityRateNameApplicableDates
description: Date range for the time period during which the Utility rate is applicable.

name: UtilityRenumerationTypeDesc
description: Method of compensation for energy produced by solar installation, for example, net energy metering, feed-in tarriff.

name: VegMgmtAreaOfVeg
description: Amount of acreage where there is vegetation such as trees and grass that must be managed by the project.

name: VegMgmtCostPerAcre
description: Proforma and actual cost of vegetation management in currency per acre.

name: VegMgmtEquipRentalExpense
description: Rental expense for equipment used for vegetation management.

name: VegMgmtFreqOfMgmtActiv
description: Number of times per year vegetation is tended.

name: VoltageMaxPower
description: Voltage of a photovoltaic device at the maximum power point.

name: VoltageOpenCircuit
description: Voltage of a photovoltaic device at open circuit conditions.

name: WashingAndWasteCostOfWater
description: Cost per gallon of water.

name: WashingAndWasteCostPerModule
description: Cost to wash an individual module.

name: WashingAndWasteEquipRentalExpense
description: Rental expense for washing equipment.

name: WashingAndWasteExpenseOfWaste
description: Cost of disposing of waste.

name: WashingAndWasteExpenseOfWater
description: Cost of water used to wash.

name: WashingAndWasteFreqOfWashing
description: Number of times per year equipment must be washed.

name: WashingAndWasteModuleQuantCount
description: Number of solar modules that are washed.

name: WashingAndWasteQuantOfWater
description: Amount of water needed for washing in gallons.

name: WeatherAdjEnergyMethOfAdjustment
description: Description of method used to adjust energy generation for weather.

name: WindDirection
description: Azimuth direction from which the wind is blowing.

name: WindSpeed
description: Velocity of the wind, typically measured at 3m height above ground.

name: WiringInstrAvailOfDoc
description: Indicates if the Wiring Instructions is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

name: WiringInstrAvailOfDocExcept
description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Wiring Instructions or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

name: WiringInstrAvailOfFinalDoc
description: Indicates if the Wiring Instructions is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

name: WiringInstrCntrparty
description: Names of counterparties to the Wiring Instructions.

name: WiringInstrDocLink
description: Link to the Wiring Instructions document.

name: WiringInstrEffectDate
description: Effective date of the Wiring Instructions.

name: WiringInstrExceptDesc
description: Description of any exceptions to the Wiring Instructions or issues raised.

name: WiringInstrExpDate
description: Expiration date of the Wiring Instructions.

name: WtEfficAvgToCECEfficValue
description: Indication if the three weighted efficiencies on the Summary sheet average to the CEC Efficiency value for the efficiency graph. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

name: ZoningCovenant
description: Description of the zoning covenant / obligation.

name: ZoningPermitAuth
description: Authority issuing the permit.

name: ZoningPermitCreditReqd
description: Does the sponsor need to post credit support for site restoration and system removal conditions. If the sponsor needs to post credit support, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

name: ZoningPermitDocLink
description: Link to the actual zoning permit document.

name: ZoningPermitDocType
description: Description of the type of documents which could be a permit or a supporting document.

name: ZoningPermitID
description: Identifier for the zoning permit related to a site.

name: ZoningPermitIssueDate
description: Date on which the permit was issued.

name: ZoningPermitProperty
description: Identifies whether this is a permit for the plant, gen tie line, or substation.

name: ZoningPermitRecurringFee
description: Description of the amount, frequency and timing of the recurring fee.

name: ZoningPermitRecurringFeeReqd
description: Indicates if there is a recurring fee for the zoning permit. If there is a recurring fee, TRUE; if there is not, FALSE.

name: ZoningPermitRenewable
description: Indicates if the zoning permit can be renewed at the end of the term. If it can be renewed, TRUE; if it cannot be renewed, FALSE.

name: ZoningPermitReqd
description: Indication as to whether a zoning permit is required.

name: ZoningPermitSiteRestorationReqd
description: Indicates if the site needs to be restored at the end of the term. If the site needs to be restored, TRUE; if not required, FALSE.

name: ZoningPermitSystemRemovalReqd
description: Indicates if the zoning permit requires system removal at the end of the term. If system removal is required, TRUE; if not required, FALSE.

name: ZoningPermitTerm
description: Term of the permit. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

name: ZoningPermitTermProvision
description: Description of the zoning permit termination provision.

name: ZoningPermitTermRightsName
description: Name of the individual or organization that has termination rights.

name: ZoningPermitType
description: Description of the type of zoning permit, for example, Special Use, Conditional Use, Variance.

name: ZoningPermitUpfrontFeeAmt
description: Amount of the upfront fee for the zoning permit.

name: ZoningPermitUpfrontFeeReqd
description: Indicates if there is an upfront fee. If there is an upfront fee, TRUE; if there is not an upfront fee, FALSE.

name: ZoningPermitUpfrontFeeStatus
description: Description of the status of the upfront fee, for example, Not Applicable, Not Due, Overdue, Partially Paid, Fully Paid.

name: ZoningPermitUpfrontFeeTiming
description: Timing of the upfront fee for the zoning permit.
